146a1(mdo sde): skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba yang rgyun chad do// sems can thams cad kyang /
146a2(mdo sde): skad cig de la 'dod chags kyis gnod par ma gyur cig/ zhe sdang gri ma yin/ gti mug gis ma yin/ nyon mongs pa gzhan gyis kyang gnod par ma gyur to// de'i tshe sems can thams cad
146a3(mdo sde): kyang byams pa'i sems dang pha ma lta bu'i 'du shes su gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od de las tshigs su bcad
146a4(mdo sde): pa 'di byung ngo // gang gis brtson 'grus stobs ni mtha' las yangs pa brtan pa brtsams gyur te// gang gis brtson 'grus chen po stobs kyis bskal pa dag las phyir phyogs spangs/
146a5(mdo sde): gang gis yon tan dag ni phyogs bcu rnams na mthu ldan rab brjod pa// shAkya thub pa'i 'od yangs 'gro ba thams cad snang bar byed pa mdzes// gang chos rgya chen bla med mnyan slad de yi zhabs la
146a6(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal te// mkhas pa blo gros brtan pa dag ni bskal pa grangs med rtag tu nyan// blo rgyas gang zhig rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa tshim skyed pa// thub pa des ni gang phyir sems can
146a7(mdo sde): bde bar bzhed pas 'di dag phyung // mngar bdag gang zhig brtson 'grus kyis ni bdud stobs mu stegs tshogs bcas pham mdzad nas// pad+ma byung ba bzhin du 'phags shing phyogs bcu dag tu lhun
146b1(mdo sde): po ji bzhin mdzes// gang zhig nyi ma bzhin du su li 'od kyis 'gro ba ma lus snang mdzad pa// de yi chos kyi 'khor lo bzhag pa don chen gsan du rgyal ba gshegs su gsol// rab tu/
146b2(mdo sde): bskor bar ma gyur mtshungs pa med cing rgyal ba kun gyis bskor gyur pa// 'khor lo dam pa stobs bcu sems can thugs brtse phyir ni de ring bskor ba mdzad// srog chags rnams kyis
146b3(mdo sde): bsten pa rnyed dka' legs pa rgya chemado ring 'byung bar 'gyur// gang dag dang pa dang ba che yangs don du gnyer ba de dag de ring ltos// de nas 'od zer de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad tshig/
146b4(mdo sde): su bcad pa 'dri dag gis bar byas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par bskul/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu g.yo bar byas/ sems cad thams cad bde bar byas/
146b5(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i khams thams cad rnam par sbyangs/ mun pa mun nag thams cad bsal/ bdud kyi khyim thams cad mog mog por byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dpag tu med
146b6(mdo sde): pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du slar 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu mi sdang bar gyur to// de nas shar phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa dri med rnam ngag rin chen
146b7(mdo sde): 'od byang chub kyi yan lag dang ldan pa'i chos rgyun mi 'chad pa'i 'od zer bkod pa'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan mtha' yas pa'i rin po che'i bsod nams bkod
147a1(mdo sde): pas/ rgya che ba dang ldan pa na byang chub sems dpa' me tog dpal gyi snying po chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu byang chub sems
147a2(mdo sde): dpa' gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten
147a3(mdo sde): gyi khams mi mdzad 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgro bos phyag 'tshal te
147a4(mdo sde): lan khri bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ lha'i nor bu bai DUR+Ya'i dra ba'i char rab tu phab ste/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
147a5(mdo sde): gis mngon par bstod do// bcom ldan rab tu mtshungs med yon tan pha rol byin/ khyod kyi yon tan bsngags 'phreng phyogs bcu kun na brjod// khyod kyi yon tan tshogs mchis zhing gang /
147a6(mdo sde): yon tan gter// der ni chos ston gnyer ba bdag cag rab tu mchis// chos dbyings mnyam nyid rnam rtog ma mchis ji bzhin du// bcom ldan dri med 'od kyis mnyam pa nyid mkhyen kyang /
147a7(mdo sde): shin tu bslabs pa'i sgyu ma mkhan ltar chos kyi rgyal// sems can rnam par dgrol slang tha dad bstan par mdzad// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa
147b1(mdo sde): tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas shar phyogs logs su gnas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dgal sdod do// de ras/
147b2(mdo sde): lho phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas rin chen spobs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' rin chen srog shing
147b3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' grang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du ba dar te lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/
147b4(mdo sde): skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ des bcom ldan 'das
147b5(mdo sde): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan khri bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing / gser gyi dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste
147b6(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// bcom ldan thugs rje'i sprin gyis 'jig rten rgyas bkang nas// 'od kyi glog phyung stong pa bdag med sla bsgrags te/
147b7(mdo sde): yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i lam gyi chu yis zhi mdzad cing // dkar po'i stobs dbang nags tshal gel ba 'phel bar mdzad// bde gshegs shes rab 'od kyis gti mug sun bsal nas//
148a1(mdo sde): ring nas srid mtshor gnyid log sems can sad mdzad de// lam yang bstan cing sred pa dag kyang bskams par mdzad// thar pa'i grong gnas rnams kyi mig kyang rnam
148a2(mdo sde): par sbyong // de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bskyod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bskyod nas lho phyogs logs su gnas te/
148a3(mdo sde): rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do// de nas nub phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams
148a4(mdo sde): snang ba dang ldan pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sgra bsgrags pa'i stobs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su
148a5(mdo sde): bskor cing mdun du bdar te lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyi
148a6(mdo sde): khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas
148a7(mdo sde): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing / nor bu mu tig gi ngo shal gyi 'phreng ba'i dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gi
148b1(mdo sde): som ldan 'das la mngon par bskyod do// khyod kyi su yi 'phrin las nam mkha'i khams 'dra ni // smon lam dge bas dag pa bye ba phrag mang ldan// dri meng rnam par dag cing zag/
148b2(mdo sde): pa med pa des// phyogs bcu'i spangs rgyas zhing rnams bsam gyis mi khyab gsal// khyod kyi tshig ni rgyan chags gsal zhing mtshungs pa ste// 'gro ba bsam dag bsam pa mnyam
148b3(mdo sde): nyid yongs tshim bgyid// sems kyi rgyu dang rnam rtog gang yang mi mnga' yang // sems can bsam pa rnams la rgyal ba dag gi 'byung // de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis
148b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ nub phyogs logs su gnas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang
148b5(mdo sde): rang gi stan dag la 'khod do// de nas byang phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yang rin chen spobs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad kyis spras
148b6(mdo sde): pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' blo mchog rgya mtsho zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig tu
148b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas skad cig tha cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi
149a1(mdo sde): spyan sngar 'dug nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la/
149a2(mdo sde): mchod pa'i las byed cing / nor bu'i do shal dang / rin po che'i dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par
149a3(mdo sde): bstod do// 'dzam bu chu gser btsom lta bur ser sku// kun nas spyan mnga' phyogs bcu dag tu rnam par mdzes// mtshungs med sru la sems can gang dag nges rtogs pa// de dag
149a4(mdo sde): skyon med bde zhing dga' ba thob par 'gyur// gang gis lhun po brtsegs pa'i lta bu'i khrun tsam du// 'jig rten mkhyen pa mtshungs med rgyal ba bltas kyang ni// de yi rdzu 'phrul kun gyi//
149a5(mdo sde): stobs dang brtson 'grus kyis// rnam par sprul pas rgyal ba'i spyi gtsug mthong mi nus// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom
149a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ byang phyogs logs su gnas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do// de nas shar dang lho'i mtshams phyog na/
149a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan thams cad bcom pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' kun nas snang ba zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu/ byang
149b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma skyed kyis yongasu bskor cing mdum du lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi kham/
149b2(mdo sde): mi mjed der byin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan par 'dug nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan
149b3(mdo sde): 'das la lamo khri bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing rin po che'i dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
149b4(mdo sde): gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// spu yis mtha' dpung ma mchis pa yi zhing 'dzin byang // sems can rnams la mi gnod zhing la mi gnod pas// mig med rnams kyis
149b5(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i spyod yul 'tshal bar dka'// sangs rgyas sras ni rgyal ba'i byin gyis yang dag 'tshal// zhing gcig phyogs pa zhing mang rab 'byam ston mdzad de/ kun tu bstar kyang rnam
149b6(mdo sde): par 'phel dang 'grib ma mchis// bsam pa chen po dag ldan ci 'drar gyur de la/ dpag med rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pas de ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang
149b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas shar dang lho'i phyogs mtshams logs su gnas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul
150a1(mdo sde): pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do// de nas lho dang nub kyi mtshams phyogs na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rjes chen pos sems can thams cad la gzigs
150a2(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mig bzang po na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po sems pa zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bcu'i
150a3(mdo sde): bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir byin te/
150a4(mdo sde): 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas
150a5(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing / na bza'i dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par
150a6(mdo sde): bstod do// sems can dam pa g.yag rnga thogs pa ji bzhin du// tshul khrims dri med nor bu rin chen dra ba srung // tshul khrims med gzigs mgon po shin tu thugs rje zhing // bdag
150a7(mdo sde): la stong pa mi mdzad gzhan la smod mi mdzad// lhun po ji bzhin khyod bstan bla ma rgya chen ston// chu gter zab mo bzhin du shin tu gting dpag dka'// srid pa dog par bcings pa kun
150b1(mdo sde): nas grol ba ste// sems can khrag khrig nyes pa chen pos bcings las grol// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom
150b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas lho dang nub kyi mtshams phyogs logs su gnas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do// de nas nub
150b3(mdo sde): dang byang gi mtshams phyogs na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od bkod pa'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mun pa dang bral ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer dra ba can
150b4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du ba dar te/ lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar
150b5(mdo sde): gyur nas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'drir phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ des bcom
150b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing rgyan gyi dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon
150b7(mdo sde): papar bkab ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// srid pa'i rang bzhin sgyu ma'i rang bzhin rtogs mdzad nas// byed pa sgyu ma lta bu dngos po med
151a1(mdo sde): par ston// sgyu ma lta bu'i sems can khams ni 'dul mdzad kyang // 'di na sems can rang bzhin ma mchis mkhas ma mchis// dper na mi zhig gnyid kyis
151a2(mdo sde): log pa'i rmi lam na// gzugs mthong yang dag 'du shes de bzhin mthong ma lags// 'dus byas dngos po ma mchis rmi lam 'dra bar gsungs// chos rnams snang yang 'di na chos la
151a3(mdo sde): chags ma mchis// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ nub dang byang gi mtshams
151a4(mdo sde): phyogs logs su gnas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do// de nas byang dang shar gyi mtshams phyogs na/ de bzhin gshegs pa nam
151a5(mdo sde): mkha'i dkyil 'khor dri ma med pa rnam par sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa dri ma med par rab tu gnas pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' blo mtha' yas dri ma med
151a6(mdo sde): ces bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/
151a7(mdo sde): skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
151b1(mdo sde): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la la mA khri bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing / rtag tu sgra 'byung ba'i sil sngar gyi dra bas bcom ldan 'das/
151b2(mdo sde): la mngon par bkab ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// zab mo'i chos la mkhas shing rab tu zhi la mos// khyod kyis chos kun spong zhing mtshan pa
151b3(mdo sde): med par mkhyen// khyod kyi thugs kyi dgongs pa 'jig rten kun ma 'tshal// mtha' yas blo mnga' sems kyis bsam pa cho ga mkhyen// sems can gcig gi spyod bzhin sems can kun gyi spyod/
151b4(mdo sde): gang dag dus gsum ldan pa de dag khyod kyis mkhyen// sems can 'du shes mi 'jug sems kyi 'du shes min// 'du shes yongs shes mkhas shing mnyam pa nyid dang ldan// de nas byang chub
151b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams logs su gnas te/ rang gi rdzu
151b6(mdo sde): 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi sman dag la 'khod do// de nas 'og gi phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ut+pal dmar po'i dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par
151b7(mdo sde): snang byed du snang ba na/ byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa'i rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du
152a1(mdo sde): bdar te/ lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ skad cig thang cig lung tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyams
152a2(mdo sde): rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan
152a3(mdo sde): 'das la mchod pa byed cing / nor bu rin po che'i gling gi 'phreng gri dra bas bco ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// gal
152a4(mdo sde): tekhrag khrig zhing na ji snyed rdul mchis pa// de snyed bde gshegs sras po rgyal ba'i drung lhags te// bskal pa bye ba stong mang zhu bzhugs pa dag/ de dag thams cad tshig gcig dus kyis go bar
152a5(mdo sde): mdzad// blo la mkhas pa rab rdzogs shes rab shin tu rdzogs// gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin rab rdzogs bsod nams mtha' yas te// bskal pa mang po mtha' las bsngags pa rab brjod kyang /
152a6(mdo sde): sgra rtses rgya mtsho ji bzhin zad par mi nus so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ 'og gi
152a7(mdo sde): phyogs logs su gnas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod // de nas steng gi phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa sgra bsgrags mchog gi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas
152b1(mdo sde): kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan gyis brgyan pa na byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'od nges bskul ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma/
152b2(mdo sde): snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir byin te
152b3(mdo sde): 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas nges bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas/
152b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing / rgyan thams cad bkod pa dang / rin po che'i dril bu g.yer kha'i dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di
152b5(mdo sde): dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// bde gshegs sku yi 'phrin las mtha' dang dpung ma mchis// bla med rnams kyi gsung thugs spyod yul mtha' yas pa// de nas sangs
152b6(mdo sde): rgyas mkhyen gyi sems can gzhan gyis min// dper na nam mkha'i mtha' ma skye bos mi rnyed bzhin// mtshungs med spyod pa mtha' dpung med pa ji bzhin du// byang chub 'khor lo de bzhin 'od de mya
152b7(mdo sde): ngan 'das// sa bon ji bzhin de ltar 'bras bu 'byung ba ltar// de bzhin phyogs bcur rgyal ba'i gnas kyang tshad ma mchis// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i
153a1(mdo sde): bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ steng gi bar snang la dong ste/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag
153a2(mdo sde): la 'khod do// de ltar phyogs bcu dag nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu 'dus pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa dag 'od des bskul ma thag tu skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la
153a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyir te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das dran pa dang ldan zhing
153a4(mdo sde): mkhyen bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ gsung bsal ba'i sgra mdzad nas/ gsung bsal ba'i sgra des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar gyur te
153a5(mdo sde): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gang dag dad pas dang zhing snod du gyur pa'i dge slong ma dang / dge slong dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / mi dang mi ma yin
153a6(mdo sde): pa de gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung bsal ba'i sgra de thos nas/ lus dang sems tshim par gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus ji ltar byung ba'i them skas dag nas/ skad cig thang
153a7(mdo sde): cig yud tsam de la 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par phyin te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu ji ltar mthun pa'i stan dag la 'khod do//
153b1(mdo sde): gsung bsal ba'i sgra de nyid kyis tshangs pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / 'od chen dang / 'od chung dang
153b2(mdo sde): tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams skyes dang / 'bras bu che dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems
153b3(mdo sde): can dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang bskul nas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'khor
153b4(mdo sde): gyi khyams rin po che bkod par phyin te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nasra/ stan rab tu bstan pa dag la 'khod do// de nas bcom
153b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dus pa chen po mkhyen nas/ smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas byang chub sems dpa'i stobs nye bar ston pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyung ste/ nges thams
153b6(mdo sde): cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de nyid kyi spyi bor mi snang bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems
153b7(mdo sde): dpa' me tog dpal gyi snying po chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba 'od des reg ma thag tu/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgyan thams cad bkod pa
154a1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so// byang chub sems dpa'i me tog dpal gyi snying pos chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
154a2(mdo sde): rgyan thams cad bkod pa la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod pa'i dbus na/ bcom ldan 'ongs kyi gdan seng ge'i khri 'phang du shing
154a3(mdo sde): ti la bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu tsam du mtho ba rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa/ kha khyer rgyan thams cad las byed pa ras bkod pa thams cad bting ba
154a4(mdo sde): me tog sil ma sna tshogs thams cad bkram pa/ bla re yid du 'ong ba thams cad bres pa byang chub sems dpa'i lus thams cad kyis yang dag par bzung ba 'khor
154a5(mdo sde): thams cad kyi mig gis bltas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa bsam pa tshim par byed pa zhig byung bar 'gyur to// de nas byang chub
154a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' me tog dpal gyi snying po chos thams cad la dbang sgyur bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan seng ge'i khri chen po bskal par bsngags pa mtha' yas zhes bya ba mngon par
154a7(mdo sde): sprul nas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las langs te gus pa dang bcas shing zhes dang bcas par thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la
154b1(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ nyi ma'i 'od kyis 'gro ba'i dgos pa rab tu bgyid// lha dbang gzi brjid yon tan sum cu rtsa gsum dga'// tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis tshangs pa'i 'jig
154b2(mdo sde): rtenarnapa par mdzes// sangs rgyas mthu yi yul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa 'di// chos rnams mi g.yo nam mkha'i rang bzhin la ma brgya// sgyum smig rgyu lta bu chu li zla 'dra zhing /
154b3(mdo sde): rje med byed pa po dang tshor ba po med par// mkhyen nas mgon po 'dir ni rnam par bsgrub pa ston// bkod pa sems kyi dbang 'gro rnams mi gzugs can min// rnam bsgrub thams
154b4(mdo sde): cad sems kyi rang bzhin dbang du 'gro// bkod pa thams cad 'dir ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhini 'dra// rnam bsgrub bdag gi ma mchis gang na'ang gnas ma mchis// gang gis sems rgyun
154b5(mdo sde): ma mchis rang bzhin dag 'tshal ba// de la blo bur gnas pa'i nyon mongs ma mchis so// rtog dang kun rtog yongs su rtog las sems grol ba// de ni sgyu ma'i rnam par sprul pa sna tshog
154b6(mdo sde): stod/ sa stengs rdul tsam mngon par 'phags pa ma mchis kyang // sa steng nor bu rin chen sna tshogs kun tu ston// gdan gang bzhugs nas sems can bye ba 'dul 'gyur ba/
154b7(mdo sde): khyod kyis seng ge'i khri gdan rab mdzes bdag gis bgyis// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan mchog dang dar gyi 'phreng ba bsgreng // de ni gang du'ang 'gro ba ma mchis 'ong ma mchis// khyod kyis gang
155a1(mdo sde): nas chos rnams 'dul ba mkhyen nas kyang // sems can dam pa rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs ston// tshangs pa'i dbyangs ltar legs shing shin tu bsrung ba'i
155a2(mdo sde): gsung // 'jig rten sgron ma mdzad pa bsod nams gzi brjid mang // bdag la thugs rtse'i slad du 'dzegs te gdan la bzhugs// rga dang 'chi dang na ba gcod pa'i chos bshad gsol//
155a3(mdo sde): khyod la bsnyen bkur bgyi dang chos ni mnyan slad du// rnam dag sems can 'di rnams phyogs bcu dag nas lhags// gang gis don du lhags pa'i don de stsal du gsol// seng ge'i
155a4(mdo sde): khri la bzhugs te chos kyang bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' me tog dpal gyi snying po chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen
155a5(mdo sde): nas/ gdan seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa brnyes nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba'i sgrib pa
155a6(mdo sde): med pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs byang chub sems dpa'i lam bkod pa la dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa
155a7(mdo sde): yongs su sgrub pa dang / ye shes kyi 'byung gnas chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug pa/ so so yang dag par rig pa la rnam par gtan la bab pa la
155b1(mdo sde): gzhol ba'i sgor 'jug pa mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes gzhol ba'i sgor 'jug pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo mo skye ba'i chos ston pa/ theg pa thams cad theg pa gcig tu/
155b2(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid du yang dag par 'du ba/ chos kyi dbyings tshul gcig cing ma 'dres pa la 'jug pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / dbang po la 'jug pa ston pa snying po
155b3(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/ chos rnam par gdon mi za ba/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa/ tshul bzhin gyi chos kyi tshul la gzhol bar 'jug pa/ nyon mongs pa
155b4(mdo sde): dang lta bar gyur pa thams cad 'dul ba/ chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug pa/ thug pa med par yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa'i thabs dang ye shes ston pa/ sangs rgyas
155b5(mdo sde): thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la 'jug pa/ chags pa med pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi sgor 'jug pa/ chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par nges pa ston pa/ rtog pa med pa/
155b6(mdo sde): rnam par rtog pa med pa/ mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pa/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad bsags pa'i phyir rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo mnyam pa nyid rtog par byed pa
155b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs mnyam pa nyid kyi rgyan dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtog pa dang / mos pa dang / shes rab zad mi shes pa mngon par
156a1(mdo sde): sgrub pa/ nyan thos kyi theg pas 'dul ba'i phyir/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i tshul la 'jug pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas 'dul ba'i phyir/ lus dang //
156a2(mdo sde): ngag dang / sems rab tu dbyen par shes/ theg pa chen pos 'dul ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sar dbang bskur ba rab tu thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan
156a3(mdo sde): thams cad brjod pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i tshul la 'jug pa 'di lta bu'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par rab tu bstan pa dang / baspyad pa dang / bshad pa dang
156a4(mdo sde): bklag pa dang / gsung ba dang / rnam par shes par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su bskang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par sprul pa
156a5(mdo sde): yang dag par bstan pa dang / 'khor gyi the tshom thams cad gcad pa dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad tshar gcad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa dar bar bya ba dang
156a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa chen po yongs su thob par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das gdan seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs so// / bam po gnyis pa/
156a7(mdo sde): de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' rin chen srog shing zhes bya bas sangs rgyas kyi rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i
156b1(mdo sde): 'khor sangs rgyas kyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlabs so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' sgra bsngags stobs kyi rgyal pos pad+ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la/
156b2(mdo sde): snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi lag pa rnams su me tog gi lnga ldi dag dang me tog gi sngon bu rnams byin gyis brlabs te/ me tog gi lnga lI dang /
156b3(mdo sde): tog gi skon bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad la mngon par 'thor ro// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos
156b4(mdo sde): dri bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi spu'i khung bu thams cad du tsan dang sbrul gyi snying po'i drir byin gyis brlabs so// de nas
156b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer dra ba can gyi 'od bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la lus kyi 'od mtha' yas/
156b6(mdo sde): bar byin gyis brlabs so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po sems pas mig mi 'dzums pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad
156b7(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par phyogs shing mig mi 'dzum par byin gyis brlabs so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' blo mtha' yas dri med kyis chos
157a1(mdo sde): la mchog tu dga' bar bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor chos don du gnyer zhing chos la dga' ba dang / mos par byin/
157a2(mdo sde): gyis brlabs so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa'i rgyan bkod pas rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas thams
157a3(mdo sde): cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor sgrib pa lnga rnam par sel bar byin gyis brlabs so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal pos brjed pa med
157a4(mdo sde): par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor byang chub kyi sems dran zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa la dmigs pa mi brjed par byin
157a5(mdo sde): gyis brlabs so// de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos zil gyis mi non pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas thams cad
157a6(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i 'khor bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom par byin gyis brlabs so// de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' bdud rab tu 'joms pas bdud kyi dkyil 'khor
157a7(mdo sde): thams cad rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bdud rab tu 'joms pa bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'joms pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la
157b1(mdo sde): snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdud bye ba phrag brgya ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dpung dang bcas/ g.yog 'khor
157b2(mdo sde): dang bcas te/ myur ba myur bar rings su rang rang gi bdud kyi gnas nas mi sdang bar gyur te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas de dag
157b3(mdo sde): gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lha'i mchod pa rnams brgya stong phrag du mas bcom ldan 'das la mchod nas/ gus pa dang bcas shing zhes dang
157b4(mdo sde): bcas par thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gsol ba 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das chos bshad du gsol
157b5(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs po chos bshad du gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' bdud rab tu 'joms pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag cag bdud kyi sug las 'dor zhing slan chad sems can rnams la
157b6(mdo sde): mig gis mi rtsol bar 'gyur ba'i las mi bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la dbugs dbyung ba stsol cig dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du mchis te/ bdag cag chos mnyan
157b7(mdo sde): papar bgyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud de dag dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// grogs po dag legs lo legs so// gang gi phyir khyed bdud
158a1(mdo sde): las kyang 'or la/ de bzhin gshegs pa la chos bshad par gsol ba yang thob cig dang / de nyid khyed kyis bdud kyi lam thams cad las 'da' ba'i rgyur 'gyur/
158a2(mdo sde): ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i phyir/ grogs po dag 'di lta ste dper na/ mun pa mun nag lo du mar bsags pa ni mar me gcig
158a3(mdo sde): gis med par 'gyur ro// grogs po dag de bzhin du nyon mongs pa'i mun pa mun nag bskal pa brgyar bsags pa yang ye shes kyi stobs bskyed pa gcig gis med par 'gyur ro// grogs po
158a4(mdo sde): dag 'dri lta ste/ dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gcigra dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gcig dang / nor bu rin po che chen po gcig gis mun pa mun nag thams cad sel to// grogs
158a5(mdo sde): po de bzhin du dge ba'i sems lhag mthong dang ldan pa gcig gis mi shes pa'i mun pa mun nag thams cad sel to// grogs po dag de'i phyir khyed dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis rim gyis mi shes pa'i
158a6(mdo sde): mun pa mun nag thams cad bsal nas/ chos kyi snang ba chen po thob par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur/
158a7(mdo sde): te/ 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi yul de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa dang / kun tu bstan pa
158b1(mdo sde): 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// deng ni de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba'i sgrib pa med pa'i sgo zhes bgyi ba 'dus pa chen po'i le'u chos kyi rnam grang
158b2(mdo sde): bshad pa bzhed par the tshom ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zho na/ bcom ldan 'das em byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'dus pa 'di ni che ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems
158b3(mdo sde): dpa' bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa mngon par shes pa'i ye shes chen pos rnam par rol pa/ phyogs bcur sgra bsgrags pa/ sems shin tu byung bar bgyis te/ dris
158b4(mdo sde): ma mchis pa rig pa dang / rnam par grol bas snang bar gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags pa/ chos thams cad la dbang phyug gis dbang sgyur ba/
158b5(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pa/ thabs la mkhas pa thams cad las nges par skyes pa/ bdud kyi las dang / rtsod pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad bsal ba/ bas kyi
158b6(mdo sde): rgol ba dang / ngan pa'i tshogs can gyi tshogs thams cad rab tu 'dul ba/ tshig thams cad rab tu dbye ba bstan pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa ma
158b7(mdo sde): mchis pa'i pha rol tu son pa/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / khrel yod pa dang / mos pa dang / gzungs dang / ye shes rab tu thob pa/ byin gyi rlabs thogs pa ma
159a1(mdo sde): mchis shing spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma lags pa shes pa la mkhas pa sems can thams cad kyi mos pa ji lta//
159a2(mdo sde): ba bzhin du chos ston pa 'khrul pa ma mchis par kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa'i chos ston pa sems can thams cad kyi sgra dang skad la mkhas pa mi 'am ci dang / bya ka la bide dang
159a3(mdo sde): khrung khrung gi sgra dang / tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs can shin tu ba shes gnyen bgyis pas sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la 'god pa byams pa chen po dang
159a4(mdo sde): snying rje chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan zhing shin tu gnas la mi g.yo zhing ji skad smra ba de bzhin du bgyid pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan yang dag par sgreng bar bgyid pa rdo rje ltar
159a5(mdo sde): sra zhing mi chags pa'i khor yug lta bu smon pa ma mchis pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo blta dka' zhing rtogs par dka' ba la zhugs pa/ chad pa dang rtag
159a6(mdo sde): par mtha' gnyis ka dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cad dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par bcad pa tshogs can chen po'i tshogs kyi rgyal po yongs su 'gug pa
159a7(mdo sde): ded dpon chen po bskal pa grangs med par chos dkon mchog gis bsod nams yang dag par bsgrubs pa sman pa'i rgyal po chen po sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa gzugs can ma lags
159b1(mdo sde): pa'i nad gso bar bgyid pa/ seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ sbrel zhi'i rgyud dang / spyi'u tshugs kyi rgyud thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba la mi skrag pa/ mtshan
159b2(mdo sde): dang dpe byad bzang pos lus legs par brgyan pa/ gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin bgyid pa thams cad la sems dpa' ba bdud bani dang nyan mongs pa'i yul 'dul ba/ mnyan pa lta
159b3(mdo sde): gyur pa/ dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa shin tu yongs su sbyangs pa bgyid pa/
159b4(mdo sde): sems can thams cad rab tu sgrol ba la brtson pa ri lta bur gyur pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad po rnyed pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang / grags pa dang / ma grags pa dang / smad pa dang /
159b5(mdo sde): bstod pa dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal las log pa/ dga' ba dang / dang ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i chos la sems zhugs pa/ chos dkon mchog gi 'od zer dang
159b6(mdo sde): ldan pa/ shes rab kyi ngoms nas ngoms par bgyid pa/ pad+ma lta bu 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos pa dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa zla ba dang
159b7(mdo sde): nyi ma dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa'i 'od mog mog por bgyid pa rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa chos dkon mchog thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba/
160a1(mdo sde): dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi gcod pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang / 'dul ba'i go cha 'tshal ba sangs rgyas kyi
160a2(mdo sde): chos dkon mchog thams cad kyi mdzod yang dag par 'dzin pa/ bsngags pa mtha' yas pa drung yang dag par ldan pa bsod nams tshad ma mchis pa bsags pa/ rnam pa thams
160a3(mdo sde): cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la nye bar gyur pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par bsngags pa mthar phyin pa 'di lta bu rnams kyi 'dus pa lags so//
160a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de la bdag 'di snyam du bcom ldan 'das ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa nges par 'byung ba sgrib pa med pa'i sgo zhes bgyi ba 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam
160a5(mdo sde): grangs bshad bzhed pa snyam bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni phan 'dogs par gyur pa sems can thams cad tshim par 'gyur ba/ ma 'ongs pa'i
160a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskyed pa sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su sbyong ba spyod pa la zhugs pa'i
160a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshul gcig la 'jug pa phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos la dbang bskur ba skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub
160b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu chud mi za ba tu nges pa'i sems can rnams la rkyen nye bar sgrub pa/ mnges pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po nye bar sgrub pa/ log pa'i dang /
160b2(mdo sde): nges pa'i sems can rnams lam la 'dzud pa/ theg pa gsum la mos pa'i sems can rnams la rnam par dgod pa ston pa ste/ ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas 'byung ba
160b3(mdo sde): nini lnga dang mi dang lA ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rgyun lags so// de ci'i slang du zhen bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas byung bar gyur na/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'dril
160b4(mdo sde): bu 'di dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gis 'khor gyi khyams 'dir sems bskyed pa gcig gis bkod pa gang byin gyis brlabs pa 'di ni
160b5(mdo sde): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bskal pa brgya phrag stong du yang ston pa'i rngo mi thog go// bcom ldan 'das de la bdag 'di snyam du bgyid de e ma ji tsam du gang /
160b6(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par sprul pa'i cho 'phrul 'di lta bu 'di mthong yang nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la re ba bskyed pa'i sems can shes rab 'chal pa can de dag ni
160b7(mdo sde): ngo mtshar che ba snyam bgyid do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa nyid kyi nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis nor
161a1(mdo sde): pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can gyi mi la la zhig nor bu rin po che bai nuR+Ya bor nas nor bu mching
161a2(mdo sde): bu la dmigs pa snyam du sems pa dang / bcom ldan 'das gang dag theg pa chen po bor nas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la dmigs par bgyi ba snyam du sems pa'i sems
161a3(mdo sde): can dag ni 'dra ba nyid du bdag la gda'a'o// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
161a4(mdo sde): bskyed pa dang / bskyed par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyis ring po mi thogs pa chos 'di lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos bstan pa
161a5(mdo sde): 'di bshad pa na lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'khor de las srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag sum cus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//
161a6(mdo sde): rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba 'dus pa'i le'u'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i 'dus pa chen po de gzigs nas e ma byang chub sems
161a7(mdo sde): dpa' 'dus pa 'di ni chos don du gnyer ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi mdzod 'dzin par mkhyen nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba sgrib pa
161b1(mdo sde): med pa'i sgolo le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs rab tu bshang ba'i phyir mi 'jigs pas spobs pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer skyes bu chen po'i mtsham gyi gtsug nas phyung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od ze re/
161b2(mdo sde): phyungam thag tu de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la ldam bdud bskor ba byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po'i lus la lam brgya
161b3(mdo sde): bskor ba byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po'i spyi gtsug tu mi sdang bar gyur to// 'od des byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rdul po la reg pa tha
161b4(mdo sde): de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dang phyug gi rgyal pos thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi 'od dang seng ge'i khri dang / lus
161b5(mdo sde): brgya 'gyur du zil gyis mnan nas lam me lhang nge lhan ne'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs rig nas
161b6(mdo sde): stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mau g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas
161b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang thad kyi steng gi bar snang la rin po che'i gdugs de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyan ces bya ba lung ni bai DUrma g.yogs ma gser snying po ni rin po chen mo yaH/
162a1(mdo sde): rtsibs ni an+da rnyil las byas pa/ mu tig gi do shal rab tu sbyangs pa/ dar gyi lda ldis mdzes par byas pa/ dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba 'khrol ba byang chub sems
162a2(mdo sde): dpa'i lus kyis bzung ba/ rgyar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad tsam zhig byin gyis brlabs so// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ rin po che'i gdugs/
162a3(mdo sde): de lta bur byin gyis brlabs nas me tog gi char yang phab ste/ sil snyan dang / sgra dbyangs rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sgra 'byung bar byin gyis brlabs nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su
162a4(mdo sde): bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// kun tu snang ba kun nas 'od zer can// don rnams ma lus ston pa kun nas spyan// rang byung chos kyi ngo bo nyid la mkhas// bsam gyis mi khyab
162a5(mdo sde): yon tan kun dang ldan// skyes bu khyu mchog gis gi 'od zer phyung // zhal yang rnam par sbyong zhing 'od mdzad pa// 'dren pa des ni bdag gi lus la yang // lan brgyar bskor ba bgyis nas/
162a6(mdo sde): spyi bor zhi// mi yi 'dren pa'i 'od kyis reg pas na// gang dag bdag gis sngon thob dran pa dang // blo gros spobs pa snang ba de bzhin gzungs// rnam pa stong du khyad par 'phags
162a7(mdo sde): par 'gyur// bdag lus rab sim sems ni rnam par dag/ bdag gi blo gros dga' mgu mnyam par gyur// gzhan yang sangs rgyas mkhyen pa mtha' yas dang // spobs pa
162b1(mdo sde): bdag gi lus lnga rab tu zhugs// sangs rgyas mthu chen bsnyen par dka' ba lnga// nyam chung dag gis mnyes par bgyid mi nus// sangs rgyas gnang nas 'gro kun pa slad du/
162b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas la ni zhu ba zhu bar 'tshal// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod 'jug dang // 'jig rten rnab 'dren dag gis 'byung ba dang // snang dang nges 'byung rnam par sprul
162b3(mdo sde): pa dang // dbang bsrung ye shes yongs su zhu bar 'tshal// theg mchog ngom pa rtogs par khong chud cing // mtha' yas rgya che ba yi 'khor lhag dang // gang dag rgya chen chos
162b4(mdo sde): don gnyer ba dag/ de dag phan slad sangs rgyas la yang nu// bdud kyi dkyil 'khor shin tu tshar bcad cing // sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di ni shin tu bzung // bcom ldan phung po ma mchis
162b5(mdo sde): dam chos mdzod// lus can rnams la bshad pa'i dus 'di lags// skyes bu khyu mchog mkhyen pa mtha' yas pas// bcom ldan de la bdag gi blo mi chud// bde gshegs
162b6(mdo sde): mkhyen pa shes pas mi dpogs pas// mkhas pa langs pa bdag ni zhu bar 'tshal// ji ltar bcom ldan khyod kyi mkhyen 'jug dang // ji ltar yun ring nas ni bslabs pa dang /
162b7(mdo sde): chos kyi dbang phyug rgyal po rab brlabs pa// 'dren pa rnams kyi spyod yul bshad du gsol// de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos tshigs su bcad pa
163a1(mdo sde): 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i
163a2(mdo sde): yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul ni tshad ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa ni yongs su mi skyo bar chos ston pa lags par
163a3(mdo sde): rig cing de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad mi gtong ba'i thugs rje chen po la gnas par mthong nas don 'di zhu bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
163a4(mdo sde): rnams kyi rgyan dag ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rgyan gang dag gis brgyan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na mdzes pa lags
163a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob nas/ gti mug gi mun pa dang bral zhing the tsom ma mchis pa dang / chos kyi sgo chen po
163a6(mdo sde): shin tu yongs su sbyangs pa rnams lags bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad mi gtong ba'i snying rje chen po dang / snying rje chen po la gnas
163a7(mdo sde): pa mchog dang ldan zhing sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar gnas pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dag byang chub sems dpa'i las
163b1(mdo sde): yang dag pa la zhugs pa dang / legs par bgyid pa'i las bgyid pa dang / las kyi mtha' gdung ba ma mchis pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ci nas kyang byang chub sems/
163b2(mdo sde): dpa' bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom zhing the tsom dang bral nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yul la mngon du 'phags par 'gyur ba
163b3(mdo sde): dang sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dag yongs su 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing
163b4(mdo sde): rnams rnam par skyong bar 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor tshar gcod par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / myur du
163b5(mdo sde): chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba thob par 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pa blo shin tu rnam par nges pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas mngon par 'phags pa'i chos kyi sgo
163b6(mdo sde): de legs par bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
163b7(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so legs so// khyod ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul tshad med pa la rnam par nges pa thob nas khyod blo rngam par nges pa 'di lta bus de bzhin gshegs pa
164a1(mdo sde): la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so// de'i phyir rigs kyi bu khyod shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / byang chub
164a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yon tan 'di dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / myur du chos
164a3(mdo sde): thams cad la dbang sgyur ba thob par 'gyur ba ngas khyod la bshad do// byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te
164a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi lhar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyan ni bzhi po 'di dag ste/
164a5(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi rgyan dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan dang / shes rab kyi rgyan dang / gzungs kyi rgyan te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
164a6(mdo sde): rnams kyi rgyur ni bzhi po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan
164a7(mdo sde): ni gcig ste/ gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la gnod pa mi byed pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang ba'i sems med pa ni sems can thams cad kyi
164b1(mdo sde): yid du 'ong zhing dga' ba ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan gcig go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyang
164b2(mdo sde): ni gnyis po 'di dag ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ngan 'gro'i sgo gcod pa dang / bde 'gro'i sgo 'byed pa ste/ gnyis po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byung
164b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyun ni gsum po 'di dag ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus rnam par dgu pa dang / ngag rnam par dag pa dang / yid
164b4(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa ste/ gsum po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyun ni bzhi po 'di dag ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gang
164b5(mdo sde): 'dod pa de 'byor pa dang / gang smon pa de yang dag par 'grub pa dang / gang 'dod pa de thob pa dang / gang rtsom pa de nyams 'og tu chung bar byed pa ste/ bzhi po 'di dag go
164b6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni lnga po 'di dag ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgyu med pa yin
164b7(mdo sde): shes rab sgyu meng ba yin// rnam par grol ba sku med pa yin/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba sgyu med pa yin/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bla na med pa yin te/ lnga po 'di dge go/ rigs
165a1(mdo sde): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni drug po 'di dag ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yid la gcags pa med pa'i tshul khrims/
165a2(mdo sde): kyi phyir skyod med pa'i tshul khrim+bu dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa'i tshul khrims kyi phyir nyams pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang / 'dren ma ma yin pa'i tshul khrims kyi phyira'adres pa ma yin pa'i
165a3(mdo sde): tshul khrims dang / dge ba'i chos shin tu rnam par 'phel ba'i phyir/ sra sde ma yin pa'i tshul khrims dang / gang gis 'dod par 'gro ba'i tshul khrims kyi phyir rang dga'i tshul
165a4(mdo sde): khrims dang / gzhan la rag ma lus pa'i shes pas/ rang gi dbang sgyur ba'i tshul khrims te/ drug po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi
165a5(mdo sde): rgyan ni bdun po 'di dag ste/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i sbyid pa rnam par dag pa dang / bzod pa rnam par dag pa dang / brtson 'grus rnam par dag
165a6(mdo sde): ba dang / bsam gtan rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab rnam par dag pa dang / thabs rnam par dag pa dang / bag yod pa rnam par dag pa ste/ bdun po 'di dag go// rigs
165a7(mdo sde): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyang gang zhe da/ 'di lta ste/ spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / sa phun sum tshogs pa dang /
165b1(mdo sde): rnam par 'phro ba med pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / lhong pa med pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / khon du 'dzin pa med pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa phung sum
165b2(mdo sde): tshogs pa dang / dal ba sum sum tshogs pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen mgu bar byed pa phun sum tshogs pa ste/ brgyad po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
165b3(mdo sde): rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni dgu po 'di dag ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jigs pa med pa yin/ skrag pa med pa yin/ bsam pa nges pa yin/ nye bar zhi ba yin
165b4(mdo sde): bsil ba yin/ bcings pa lhod pa yin/ sems las su rung ba yin/ sems cad shes pa yin/ dul ba'i sa rjes su thob pa yin te/ dgu po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang
165b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni bcu po 'di dag ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir/ lus kyi rgyan dang
165b6(mdo sde): jiskad smras pa de bzhin byed pa'i phyir ngag gi rgya ma dang / nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir sems kyi rgyan dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir/ zhing gi rgyan dang / bsam pa yongs su
165b7(mdo sde): skyong ba'i phyir sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i rgya mdang / sdig pa thams cad mi byed pa'i phyir/ skye ba'i rgyan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa la rjes su slob pa'i phyir/ byang
166a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyan dang / nga rgyal med pa'i phyir shes pa'i rgyan dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir/ byang chub kyi sring po'i rgyan dang
166a2(mdo sde): tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba la gnas pa mi 'dor ba'i phyir/ stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rgyan te/ rigs kyi bu bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems
166a3(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan no// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi
166a4(mdo sde): rgyun ni gcig ste/ gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la byams pa ste/ 'di ni gcig go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin
166a5(mdo sde): gyi rgyan ni gnyis po 'dri dag ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ drang ba dang / mnyen pa ste/ gnyis po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin
166a6(mdo sde): gyi rgyun ni gsum po 'di dag ste/ gsum ga pa ne na/ 'di lta ste/ sgyu med pa dang / g.yo med pa dang / bcod pa med pa skye/ grasum po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byung
166a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyam mi bzhi po 'di dag rtse/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dun pas 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba yin pa
166b1(mdo sde): mi 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba ste/ bzhi po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams
166b2(mdo sde): kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni lnga po 'di dag ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sgrib pa lnga spong ba ste/ lnga po de dag gang zhe na/ 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang / gnod sems dang
166b3(mdo sde): thugs pa dang / gnyid dang / rgod pa dang / 'dod pa dang / the tsom ste/ sgrib pa lnga po 'di dag spong ba'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni drug
166b4(mdo sde): po 'di dag ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /
166b5(mdo sde): tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa skye/ drug po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni bdun po 'di dag ste/ bdun
166b6(mdo sde): gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i byang chub kyi yang lag bdun sgom pa ste/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rab tu 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi
166b7(mdo sde): yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang
167a1(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/ bdud po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'//
167a2(mdo sde): rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa ste/ 'di ltar yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /
167a3(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tshe ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang
167a4(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/ brgyad po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyun ni dgu po 'di dag ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu
167a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' brjed pa med pa'i sems kyis snying rje chen po'i gnas la gnas te/ sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar gnas nas 'dod pa dag las dben
167a6(mdo sde): pasdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang
167a7(mdo sde): po rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dag ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rtog pa med pa/ dpyod pa med pa
167b1(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing
167b2(mdo sde): dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste
167b3(mdo sde): dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs te snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba yang nub pas
167b4(mdo sde): bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang / dran pa yongs su dag pa/ bsam gtan bzhi pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du
167b5(mdo sde): gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha'
167b6(mdo sde): yas so snyam nas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam
167b7(mdo sde): par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te
168a1(mdo sde): ci yang med do snyam nas/ ci yang med pa'i skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das
168a2(mdo sde): nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du
168a3(mdo sde): shes dang tsher ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang / thabs mkhas pas yang dag pa'i mtha'i mngon sum du yang mi byed la/ sngon gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis yang
168a4(mdo sde): langs nas sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed pa ste/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni dgu po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni bcu
168a5(mdo sde): po 'di dag ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi 'khrugs pas nges par sems pa dang / zhi gnas yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / mngon par brtson par mi 'dor ba dang
168a6(mdo sde): nang du yang dag 'jog sbed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chud mi za ba dang / sems dben pa dang / lus shin tu sbyangs pa dang / chos rnams la sems shing 'jal la so sor rtog pa dang /
168a7(mdo sde): sems la dbang sgyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i rigs rab tu 'thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni bcu po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu de la byang
168b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan gang nen/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi can ni gcig ste/ gcig gang zhen/ 'di sa ste/ chos thams/
168b2(mdo sde): cad la the tsom med pa ste/ 'di ni gcig go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni gnyis po 'di dag ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'gyod pa dang /
168b3(mdo sde): bral ba dang / kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba ste/ gnyis po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgya mari gsum po 'di dag skye/ gsum gang zhen
168b4(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ gti mug spong ba dang / ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs nges par gcog pa dang / mun pa mun nag sel ba ste/ gsum po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
168b5(mdo sde): rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyun ni bzhi po 'di dag ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya ba'i shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba spang ba'i snang ba dang / 'gog
168b6(mdo sde): pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon gsal dang / lam bsgom pa'i byin gyis rngubs te/ bzhi po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni lnga po 'di ngas
168b7(mdo sde): ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dmigs pa med pas tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su dag pa dang / shes rab mchog gi bsam gtan pa yin pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po yongs
169a1(mdo sde): su dag pa dang / gnyis dang bral bas rnam par grol ba'i phung po yongs su dag pa dang / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid bas rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung /
169a2(mdo sde): po yongs su dag pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid pas/ chos kyi phung po yongs su dag pa ste/ lnga po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab
169a3(mdo sde): kyi rgyan mi drug po 'di dag ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sgyu ma dang mnyam pa nyid pas/ bdag gi 'khor yongs su
169a4(mdo sde): dag pa dang / rmi lam dang mnyam pa nyid pas sems can gyi 'khor yongs su dag pa dang / rnam par smin pa la re ba med pas/ byang chub kyi 'khor yongs su dag pa'o// 'khor gsum yod
169a5(mdo sde): su dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs brnyan lta bu'i phyir lus kyi 'khor yongs su dag pa dang / brag cha lta bu'i shes pas ngag gi 'khor yongs su dag pa dang / sgyu ma dang /
169a6(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid pas sems kyi 'khor yongs su dag pa'o// 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni nyes par smras pa'i tshig rnams la khong khro ba med pa yongs su dag pa dang //
169a7(mdo sde): bstod pa dang / bsngags pa dang / rjes su 'chag pa spong ba yongs su dag pa dang / yan lag dang nying lag gcod pa dag la chos kyi sku rab tu rtog pa yongs su dag pa'o// 'khor gsum yongs
169b1(mdo sde): su dag pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'khor ba rmi lam lta bur mos pas yongs su mi skyo ba yongs su dag pa dang / rdo rje lta bu'i bsam pas brtan pa yongs su dag pa dang / mtshan ma thams/
169b2(mdo sde): cad las sgrol bas/ blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa yongs su dag pa'o// 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'gyur bar shes pas/ de las ma chags
169b3(mdo sde): pa yongs su dag pa dang / mngon par shes pa med pas lhag mthong yongs su dag pa dang / mngon par shes pa skyed pas dmigs pa yongs su dag pa'o// 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i thabs kyi
169b4(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa ni sems can yongs su smin par byed pas bsdu ba'i dngos po yongs su dag pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pas gzungs yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
169b5(mdo sde): rgyan ni phyir smon lam yongs su dag pa skye/ drug po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ri bdun po 'di dag ste/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste// dran
169b6(mdo sde): pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis lus
169b7(mdo sde): dang sems dben pa dang / dbang po rnams la dbang por yongs su shes pa dang / stobs rnams kyis bdud dang nyon mongs pa thams cad tshar gcod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis
170a1(mdo sde): chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid dang / lam rnams la 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med par shes pa ste/ bdun po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
170a2(mdo sde): rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shin tu zhi ba'i phyir zhi gnas shes pa dang / rab rib dang bral ba'i phyir lhag mthong shes pa dang /
170a3(mdo sde): chos kyi phung po rjes su rtogs pa'i phyir phung po shes pa dang / nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir khams shes pa dang / grong stong pa dang mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir skye mched shes pa dang //
170a4(mdo sde): bdag med pa'i phyir rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa dang / mi 'khrugs pa'i phyir bden pa shes pa dang / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu rtog pas chos thams cad nges par rtogs pa
170a5(mdo sde): shes pa ste/ brgyad po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni dgu po 'di dag ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sngon gyi mtha' dag pas 'das
170a6(mdo sde): pa shes pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dag pas ma 'ongs pa shes pa dang / bar gyi mtha' dag pas/ da ltar byung ba shes pa dang / rgyu chud mi za bas nges pa rnam pa shes pa dang / rkyen phye bar
170a7(mdo sde): sgrub pas ma nges pa rnams shes pa dang / yongs su smin par byed pas/ log pa nyid du ma nges pa rnams shes pa dang / chos kyi skus rab tu phye ba'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam pa
170b1(mdo sde): nyid du shes pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos kyi phyir chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'i phyir/ 'phags pa thams cad mnyam
170b2(mdo sde): pa nyid du shes pa ste/ dgu po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni bcu po 'di dag ste/ bcu gang zhin/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par bsgrub pa
170b3(mdo sde): mtshan nyid kyi phyir sgyu ma lta bur shes pa dang / yongs su rtog pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir rmi lam lta bur shes pa dang / rnam par 'khrul pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir sdig rgyu lta bur shes pa dang /
170b4(mdo sde): 'pho ba med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir gzugs brnyan lta bur shes pa dang / 'du 'phrod kyi mtshan nyid kyi phyir mig yor lta bur shes pa dang / rkyen gyi mtshan nyid kyi phyir brag cha lta bur shes pa
170b5(mdo sde): dang chos kyi dbyings 'dres pa med pa'i mtshan nyid du shes pa dang / de bzhin nyid gnas med pa'i mtshan nyid du shes pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' mi 'khrugs pa'i mtshan nyid du shes pa
170b6(mdo sde): dang / 'dus byas dag 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid du shes pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyan ni bcu po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams
170b7(mdo sde): kyi gzungs kyi rgyan gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni gcig ste/ gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa brjed pa med pa ste/ 'di ni gcig go//
171a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni gnyis po 'di dag ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ kun tu 'dzin pa dang / 'dzin pa ste/ gnyis//
171a2(mdo sde): po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni gsum po 'di dag ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don la mkhas pa dang / tshig 'bru la mkhas pa dang /
171a3(mdo sde): nges pa'i tshig la mkhas pa ste/ gsum po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni bzhi po 'di dag ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chags
171a4(mdo sde): pa med pa'i dang / rtsub pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang / rab tu 'gro ba'i tshig dang / brdzun pa med pa'i tshig ste/ bzhi po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzung
171a5(mdo sde): kyi rgyan ni lnga po 'di dag ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thos pa thams cad kyi nang nas don la rton pa dang / yi ge'i tshogs thams cad kyi nang nas ye shes la rton pa dang / mdo
171a6(mdo sde): sde thams cad kyi nang nas nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton pa dang / gang zag gi sgra thams cad las chos nyid la rton pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las 'jig rten las 'das pa la rton pa
171a7(mdo sde): ste lnga po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni drug po 'di dag ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa dang
171b1(mdo sde): bde pa'i rjes su 'thud pa'i tshig rab tu 'thob pa dang / ngargyal mengad pas gzung bar 'os pa'i tshig dang / g.yo med pas byung bar 'os pa'i tshig dang / spring chen po la sbyor bas 'bras bu yong /
171b2(mdo sde): ba'i chos ston pa dang / stong ba la mkhas pas chad par chos snyom dang / 'jig rte shes byas dus su chos stom pa ste/ drug po 'di dag go// rigs kyi pa byang chub sems dpa' rna
171b3(mdo sde): kyi gzungs kyi rgya ma'i bdud po 'di dag yin te/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta rgyu/ mgyogs pa'i spobs pa dang / shugs can gyi spobs pa dang / myung ba'i spobasnang dang / chags pa med/
171b4(mdo sde): ba'i spobs pa dang / rgyud chad med pa'i spobs pa dang / 'khrul pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / shin tu nges pa'i tshig gi spobs pa ste/ bdun po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
171b5(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyun ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lha'i skad shes pa dang / klu'i skad shes pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi skad shes pa dang / dri za'i snang/
171b6(mdo sde): shes pa dang / lA ma yin gyi skad shes pa dang / nam mkha' lding gi skad shes pa dang / mi 'am ci'i skad shes pa dang / lto 'phye chen po'i skad shes pa nas/ sems can thams cad kyi
171b7(mdo sde): bar gyi skad shes pa ste/ brgyad po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni dgu po 'di dag ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor gyi nang du sa
172a1(mdo sde): gong ba med pa dang / smra ba'i nang du zhum pa med pa dang / chos bshad pa'i nang du 'jigs pa med pa dang / 'dri ba rnams la nges par 'byung ba shes pa dang / mngon pa'i nga
172a2(mdo sde): rgyal can rnams la sbrel zhing bstan pa shes pa dang / yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la rjes su 'thun pa bstan pa shes pa dang / khengs pa dag la lag na rdo rje ston pa dang / mngon par chags pa
172a3(mdo sde): rnams la sreg pa'i bskal pa ston pa dang / yongs su smin pa rnams la theg pa'i rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa ste/ dgu po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs
172a4(mdo sde): kyirgyan ni bcu po 'di dag ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dogs pa thams cad la the tshom med par ston pa shes pa dang / blos chos bskyed pa'i sgo dang / shes rab kyi snang ba gzhan la rag
172a5(mdo sde): ma las pa dang / yi ge bstan pa mi zad pa dang / don bstan pa rgyun chad pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa mtha' yas pa yang dag pa rab tu brjod pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i
172a6(mdo sde): skyon mu med par brjod pa dang / rnam par byang ba bsngags pa tshad med pa ston pa dang / dbang po thams cad la gzhol bar 'jug pa chags pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi snang ba'i so so yang
172a7(mdo sde): dag par rig pa la 'jug pa shes pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni bcu po 'di dag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir/
172b1(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// gang gis thegs mchog dam pa 'di mdzes pa// blo gros chen po rnams kyi rgyan bzhi ste// tshul khrims ting 'dzin de bzhin shes rab mchog/ shin tu/
172b2(mdo sde): rnam nges don dang de bzhin gzungs// de ni lus can kun gyi yid 'ong dga'// lus dang ngagra rnams dang ni ying dag cing // de yi rnam par lhung ba kun 'chad pa// 'di ni tshul khrims ldan pa'i
172b3(mdo sde): rgyun yin no// lha mi rnams kyi nang du mkhas pa skye// de yi smon lam ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'grub// nan tan snying por byed dang yang dag ldan// 'di ni tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan yin no//
172b4(mdo sde): de yi ting 'dzin sgyu ma ma yin te// shes rab rnam grol de bzhin ye shes mthong // de yi mya ngan 'das pa sgyu ma min// 'di ni tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i rgyun// tshul khrims skyon med
172b5(mdo sde): tshul khrims rnam par dag/ tshul khrims sra sre ma yin 'dren ma med// de yi rang dga' de bzhin rang dbang yin// 'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan// tshul khrims kyis ni
172b6(mdo sde): sbyin pa dag par 'gyur// bzod pa dag cing de bzhin brtson 'grus dag/ bsam gtan dag cing de bzhin shes rab dag/ thabs dang de bzhin bag yod dag pa yin// g.yo ba med cing gtan
172b7(mdo sde): lo shin tu gnas// sa mchog thob cing rnal 'byor rnam 'phro med// lhod pa spangs shing dag sra gso yang sra// 'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan// brtson 'grus 'bar zhing /
173a1(mdo sde): tshul khrims bsngags pa ste// de yi sems ni nam yang gdung mi 'gyur// de la yid la bcags par 'gyur med de// 'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan
173a2(mdo sde): 'jigs pa med cing mi skrag mi zhum ste/ bsam pa nges shing ni la yid rab zhi// 'dir ni de yi bcing ba lhod par gyur// 'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan// grags chen sems ni
173a3(mdo sde): las su rung ba yin// de ni dul zhing de bzhin cang shes yid// 'di ni rang lus mtshan gyi rgyan byed pa// 'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan// de ni ji skad smras pa de bzhin te// mkhas/
173a4(mdo sde): pa de ni ngag gi rgyan thob ste// de ni nyon mongs med pas rtag sems brgyan// 'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan// khyad par 'phags pa'i zhing ni legs par brgyan// theg pa
173a5(mdo sde): mchog la sems can yongs smin te// gang phyir sdig pa thams cad mi byed pas// rang gi skye ba legs par rgyan pa byed// byang chub spyod pa rtag tu rgyan byed cing // byang chub snying po dam pa rgyan
173a6(mdo sde): par byed// stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dag rgyan byed cing // nga rgyal med pas shes pa legs par rgyan// de ni byams pas sems can kun khyab byed// mkhas pa rtag tu dran pa mnyen pa yin//
173a7(mdo sde): g.yo med cing ni sgyu med bcos pa med// gti mug 'dod sdang 'jigs pas 'gro ba yin// de ni sgrib pa lnga po rnam par sel/ bag yod gyur nas rjes su lam drug sgom// byang chub yan la/
173b1(mdo sde): bdun dang lam sgom ste/ mthar gyis dgu dang ting 'dzin pasam gtan byed// rnal 'byor pa mi ni gnas nges sems sbyor// de ni tshul bzhin dge ba chung mi gzon// dben dang shi mtha
173b2(mdo sde): sbyangs dang so sor rtog/ 'phags pa'i rigs la dbang mi sgyur ba yin// chos rnams la ni the tshom med par 'gyur// de la kun nas ljang dang 'gyod pa med// de la ma rig gti mug mu ba
173b3(mdo sde): maung/ bden pa snang zhing yongs su shes pa shes// tshul khrims dag pa dmigs pa med pa ste// shes rab ngas pa bsam gtan ting 'dzin dag/ gnyis gsal nas ni rnam par grol ba dag
173b4(mdo sde): lhag pa'i nga rgyal med cing shes pa dag/ dus gsum dag la ye shes mthong mi chags// 'dod chags bral ba'i shes pas chos kyang dag/ dag nas 'dir ni de la rlom sems med//
173b5(mdo sde): 'di ni gang dag shes dang ldan pa'i rgyad// shes rab kyis ni sbyin pa brgyan gyur te// rmi lam sgyu mtshol ba med pa'i phyir// bdag dang byang chub de bzhin sems can rnams// 'khor gsum
173b6(mdo sde): po dag de ni rnam par myong // shes rab kyis ni tshul khrims brgyan gyur te// gzugs brnyan sgyu ma brag cha 'dra ba'i phyir// lus dang ngag rnams dang ni de bzhin sems// 'khor gsum po
173b7(mdo sde): dag de ni rnam par myong // shes rab kyis ni bzod pa brgyar gyur te// mkhas dang mtho min dpa' bar 'gyur min dang // dam pa'i chos su rtag tu rab rtog pa// 'khor gsum po dag de ni
174a1(mdo sde): rnam par sbyong // shes rab kyis ni brtson 'grus brgyan gyur te// skyo ba med cing bsam pa brtan pa dang // de ni blang ba med cing dor med pa// 'khor gsum po dag/
174a2(mdo sde): de ni rnam par skyong // shes rab kyis ni bsam gtan brgyan gyur te// de la ma chags 'gyur dang lhag mthong dang // mkhas dang mngon par shes pa bskyed pa dang // 'khor gsum po dag de
174a3(mdo sde): ni rnam par sbyong // shes rab kyis ni thabs kyang rgyan byed de// shin tu bdud dang bzungs dang yang dag smon// 'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam sbyong zhing // sems can chos dang de bzhin
174a4(mdo sde): zhing rnams skyong // dran pa nye bar bzhag la dran mi 'jug/ yang dag spong ba rnams la gnyis med de// rdzu 'phrul gyis ni lus dang sems kyang dben// sems can gyis ni dbang po
174a5(mdo sde): kun mi shes// bdud dang nyon mongs rnams kyis zil mi non// chos kyi rang bzhin tshul bzhin rjes su rtogs// de bzhin lam la 'od med 'gro ba med// 'di ni gang dag shes rab ldan
174a6(mdo sde): pa'i rgyan// de ni shin tu zhi bas zhi gnas shes// de yi lhag mthong spyod yul mtha' yas te// chos kyi phung po ji bzhin phung po shes// khams ni nam mkha' mtshungs shing 'dra bar
174a7(mdo sde): shes// des ni stong pa lta bur skye mched shes// rten pas bsags pas chos rnams 'byung med de// don dam bden par 'khrugs pa med par shes// tshul bzhin gyis ni nges par
174b1(mdo sde): rtogs par shes// dus gsum la ni chags med ye shes 'jug/ rnam par gzhag phyir phung po gsum yang shes// dkon mchog gsum ni mtshan nyid gcig tu shes// 'di ni/
174b2(mdo sde): gang dag shes rab ldan pa'i rgyun// rnam bsgrubs mtshan nyid sgyu ma lta bur shes// yongs brtags rtsa ba rmi lam ji bzhin no// rnam 'phrul mtshan nyid smig chu 'dra ba ste// 'phro me chos
174b3(mdo sde): rnams gzugs brnyan mtshan nyid do// 'du 'phrod byung ba mig yor lta bu ste// rkyen rnams kyis ni brag cha ji bzhin no// chos kyi dbyings ni rtag tu ma 'dres shes// de bzhin nyid ni gnas
174b4(mdo sde): med de rab shes// yang dag mtha' ni rtag tu mi g.yo chos// 'dus ma byas dang 'dus byas gnyis su med// shes rab zab cing blo ni rab yangs pa// brgyan nas sangs rgyas chos
174b5(mdo sde): rnams tshol bar byed// de ni nam yang dran pa brjed pa med// chos rnams kun tu 'dzin cing 'dzin par byed// don dang tshig 'bru la ni rtag tu mkhas// nges tshig shes pa rtag par rtogs
174b6(mdo sde): khong chud// chags med tshig dang rtsub pa ma yin dang // rab tu grol ba'i tshig dang brdzun med tshig/ thos pa kun don rtag tu rtog pa dang // mkhas pa de ni ye shes rtog par byed// nges
174b7(mdo sde): don mdo sde rtogs par rab tu shes// gang zag med pa'i chos nyid rton byed cing // 'jig rten 'das pa'i chos nyid la yang rton// de ni gzungs kyis brgyan par gyur pa yin// de'i tshig ni bden
175a1(mdo sde): pa'i rjes su 'thun// gzung bar 'os dang dus su 'os pa yin// de yi chos bstan de ni 'bras bu yod// chad pa dang ni dus su rgyun chags 'jug/ de yi spobs pa
175a2(mdo sde): 'gyogs pa skye ba ste// shugs can dang ni myur dang rtag mi chags// rgyun chad med dang 'khrul med nges pa'i tshig/ legs par brgyus pa'i 'phreng bas legs brgyan bzhin// lha
175a3(mdo sde): dang klu yi skad ni rab tu shes// gnod sbyin dag dang dri za lha min dang // mkha' lding mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye che// sems can kun gyi skad kyang rab tu shes// 'khor lhags shes nas snga
175a4(mdo sde): gong med pa ste// smra ba mthong nas zhum par 'gyur ba'ang med// 'jigs pa med par chos kyi gtam yang brjod// 'dri ba rnams la nges 'byung rab tu shes// lhag pa'i nga rgyal can
175a5(mdo sde): mthong snrel zhi yi// gtam brjod rnal 'byor mthong nas rjes su 'thun// nga rgyal can la lag na rdo rje ston// yul mngon chags la sreg pa'i bskal pa ste// theg pa gsum gyi rim pa'i
175a6(mdo sde): gtam yang brjod// dogs pa kun gyi the tshom gcod pa ste// blo yis chos rnams mngon sum gyur pa yin// de yi shes rab nam yang gzhan mi ltos// yi ge thams cad rtag tu zad med shes// /
175a7(mdo sde): don rnams nges pa dag la rgyun chags te// de ni sangs rgyas chos rnams mtha' yas brjod// de ni gzungs kyis brgyan par gyur pa yin// kun nas nyon mongs skyon ni mtha' yas shes// rnam
175b1(mdo sde): par byang ba'i phan yon thub pa med// de bzhin sems can dbang po thams cad shes// sangs rgyas snang ba'i so so rig pa thob// de ni gzungs kyis brgyan par gyur pa ste// de yi yon tan 'di//
