264a6(mdo sde): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus na 'dug pa'i spyi gtsug gi drang thad kyi steng na/ de bzhi ma gshegs pa'i sku gser gyi mdog can mtshan dang dpe byad kyis legs par brgyan pa'i lus dang /
264a7(mdo sde): ldan pa'i gzugs 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs des phyag g.yas pa de'i spyi gtsug tu 'jug go// phyag bzhag ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' de sangs rgyas kyi
264b1(mdo sde): rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i lus kyi las dang ldan par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i ngag gi lus dang ldan par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi rgyan gyis btsun pa'i yid kyi las dang ldan pa/
264b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// de chos de lta bu dang ldan te/ 'khor thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa la 'jug pas ma so ci rigs par chos ston to// zhag gcig gam/ zhag gnyis sam/ gsum mam/
264b3(mdo sde): zhag bdun nam/ zla ba byed dam/ zla ba gcig gam/ dus sum/ lo khyud khor ram/ lo brgya'am/ lo stong ngam/ lo brgya phrag stong ngam/ ji tsam du 'dod pa de tsam du kha zas dang bral ba'i
264b4(mdo sde): rgyud kyis chos ston kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis shin tu yongs su gzung ba'i phyir de'i chos kyi sgo yongs su zad par mi 'gyur/ lus dang sems ngal bar mi 'gyur ro// shes pa
264b5(mdo sde): chen po bzhi dang ldan par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can gyi bsam pa dang tshig rab tu dbye ba shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa mi zad pa shes pa dang / theg pa ji ltar rnam
264b6(mdo sde): par dgod par shes pa dang / so so ci rigs par chos ston par shes pa dang ldan par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni sangs rgyas kyis rgyan byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs gang cung zad gno
264b7(mdo sde): ba'i sgor 'jug pa zhes bya'o// gzungs 'di ni mi zad pa/ thug pa med pa'i rjes su song ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshams dang bcas pa/ bsnam pa tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang
265a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs mi brgyad po 'di dag ste/ gzungs de dag la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa kun/
265a2(mdo sde): tu 'dzin to// chos ston pa ni mi zad par 'gyur ro// legs par bshad pas sems can thams cad tshim par byed par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang
265a3(mdo sde): phyug gi rgyal pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// bde gshegs rnams kyis rab tu gsungs pa'i gzungs brgyad po// theg pa 'dir ni de dag rnam par nges thob pa// mdo sde bye
265a4(mdo sde): ba stong phrag thug pa med 'chad kyang // de ni don dang tshig 'bru gang la'ang chags pa med// yid 'ongs shin tu sbran cing chags par 'gyur ba'i dbyangs// bye ba stong phrag tshad med zhing du go
265a5(mdo sde): byed pa// sems can rnams kyis de thos mya ngan 'das par 'gro// skra dbyangs rnam par dag pa'i gzungs 'di thug pa med// yi ge thams cad shes pa mkhas pa blo gros ldan// bskal
265a6(mdo sde): ba mang por 'chad kyang chos la zad pa med// rtsa ba'i tshig gcig brjod pa'ang zad par mi 'gyur te// mi zad chos kyi zam tog 'di dran pa'i sa// gang gis gzugs thob tha mar thug par/
265a7(mdo sde): yongs sa ga// mnyam nyid tshul bzhi chos la sems pa tho mas ldan// mthar 'dzin thams cad rnam pa mas te tshangs dag pa// khyu mchog byung ba de ni dbus la gnas mi gyur/
265b1(mdo sde): gang gis mtsho chen phyag rgya'i gzungs ni rab thob pa// de yi kha nas phyag rgya bsam las brjod pa na// gang dag gling bzhi'i gzugs kyi rnam pa ji snyed pa// de dag kun dang rgya mtsho mtsho chen
265b2(mdo sde): bcas mi rtog/ 'khor du gal te bdag nyid chen po de chos ston// nam mkha' las ni pad+ma dag gi char chen 'bab// pad+ma dag las chos rnams bye ba rab tu 'byung // 'di ni pad+ma bkod pa'i
265b3(mdo sde): gzungs te yongs su dag/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs ni gal te thob gyur na// tshig gcig brjod pa rab tu smra dang gnyis drag dang // gsum dang bzhi dang lnga dang bye ba dag dang ni// khrag
265b4(mdo sde): khrig thug pa med par spru la chags pa med// gang gis rnam par gdon mi za ba'i gzungs thob pa// don dang chos dang nges tshig spobs pa ji snyed pa// phyogs bcu'i sems can ji snyed ma
265b5(mdo sde): bos longs dris na// de dag the tsom kun bcad dogs pa med par 'gyur// gang gis sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzungs thob pa// gzi brjid chen po de ni bstan la 'dug pa na// sangs/
265b6(mdo sde): rgyas phyag g.yas de yi spyi bor 'jog mdzad de// de yang rgyal ba'i spobs pa ci 'dra bzhin du 'gyur// gang gis gzungs rnams 'di dag rab tu thob gyur pa// de yi yon tan bsam yas thug
265b7(mdo sde): pa med 'gyur te// gang+gA'i snyed kyis bskal pa bye ba stong brjod kyang // khyu mchog gyur pa'i bsngags pa brjod pas zad pa med// gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa/
266a1(mdo sde): de yi shes pa srid pa gsum la mnyam 'jug ste// pad+ma bzhin du srid pa gsum las 'phags 'gyur zhing // ri rab bzhin du yul rnams kyis ni mi bskyod 'gyur//
266a2(mdo sde): gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa// de ni srid kun rnam par spangs pa'i spyad spyod de// mu stegs can gyi tshogs kun 'joms pa sgrog pa na// seng ge bzhin du
266a3(mdo sde): 'khor du 'jigs pa med par 'gyur// sa ltar dge ba rnams ni rnam par skyed par 'gyur// chu ltar dri ma rnams ni rab tu ded par 'gyur// me ltar rlom sems med cing rnam rtog med par
266a4(mdo sde): 'gyur// rlung ltar yul rnams la ni chags pa med par 'gyur// gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa// de ni smra tshe shes dang dbang po 'khrug pa med// de ni sman pa bzhin//
266a5(mdo sde): du 'gro ba thar byed 'gyur// phan par 'dod pas chos kyi bkru sman sbyin par byed// gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa// skye bo tshogs rnams de la blta bas mi ngoms
266a6(mdo sde): te/ zla ba bzhin du dge ba dag ni rnam sbyong 'gyur// sems snyoms gzi brjid chen po 'od zer mnyam par gtong // gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa// de ni
266a7(mdo sde): 'gro ba'i sred pa ma lus skam par byed// nyi ma bzhin du 'od byed mun pa sel bar 'gyur// gnyid log sems can srid pa gsum las sad par byed// gang gis gzungs kyi mchog/
266b1(mdo sde): rnams rab tu thob gyu pa// de mi kun la cung zad tsam yang 'dzin pa med// de ni rgyal po bzhin du 'jig rten dbang phyug che// rnam thos bu bzhin nor ldan chos rnams stom par byed/
266b2(mdo sde): glang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa// rdzu 'phrul chen po dran ldan klu dang 'drar 'gyur te// sprir gyi bya ba byed cing mkha' las klog byung nas// zhi bar bya byor nga ma chos
266b3(mdo sde): kyi char pa 'bebs// gang gis gzus kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa// 'khor rnams thams cad khyu mchog gyur pa'i gdong du lha// brgya byini bzhin du spang ba ma yin gzugs
266b4(mdo sde): mchog ldan// blo chen 'gro ba rnams la chos dang don rnams sems// gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa// de ni tshangs pa'i gnas pa yongs dag bsam gtan byed//
266b5(mdo sde): tshangs pa bzhin du mnyam gzhag snying rje ldan par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'di kun zil gyis mnan nAs bsam gtan byed// gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa/
266b6(mdo sde): de ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas mngal mchod par byed// de ni rtag tu mngon shes lha las nyams mi 'gyur// zhing brgya bsam gyis mi khyad dag tu mkha' nas 'gro// gang gis gzungs
266b7(mdo sde): kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa// de ni ring por mi thogs sangs rgyas yon tan 'thob// phyogs na rgyal ba rnams ni de yi bsngags brjod de// bu gcig pa zhig yon tan ldan pa bzhin
267a1(mdo sde): du bskyod// gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa// de yi skyobs pa 'phreng ba legs brgyas rdzi bzhin te// mdo sde zang mo sna tshogs mang po lar /
267a2(mdo sde): pa na// spobs pa rgya che yangs shing zad pa med par 'gyur// gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa// de la rgyags pa med cing g.yo med nga rgyal med// dran ldan blo gros ldan
267a3(mdo sde): zhing blo ldan rtogs dang ldan// ye shes mtha' yas spyod yul nam mkha' bzhin du 'gyur// gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa// de yis 'dus byas nyes pa thams//
267a4(mdo sde): cang rab tu chad// shes rab ye shes thabs dang zung du 'brel bar 'gyur// byams dang snying rje dag kyang zung du 'brel bar 'gyur// gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa//
267a5(mdo sde): de ni spra tshe 'khrul pa cung zad mi dmigs te// bdag nyid che de sems can rnams kyi sgra skad shes// spyod dang dbang po dang ni mos pa thams cad shes// gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams
267a6(mdo sde): rab tu thob gyur pa// des ni chos la lhag mthong dge dang dran pa dang // rdzu 'phrul dang ni spong dang dbang po stobs lnga dang // byang chub yan lag de bzhin lam mchog zhi gnas 'thob/
267a7(mdo sde): gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa// de ni bde gshegs rnams kyi spyod yul rang gis rtogs// pha rol phyin pa dag gis kun gyi pha rol son// bsdu ba'i dngos po kun
267b1(mdo sde): la mkhas shing blo gros ldan// gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa// de la nam yang 'khrul ba cung zad mi dmigs te// nges pa de ni ni ning nyer 'i myos pa med/
267b2(mdo sde): de ni spyod la rab tu gnas kyung shin tu dul// gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa// de mi bde gshegs spyan sngar pad+ma'i steng na 'dug/ de yi lus ni chos rgyus
267b3(mdo sde): ba rdul dang bral// de yi lus la mngal gyi dri mas gos mi 'gyur// gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa// de ni rgyal ba kun gyis byin brlabs chos smra ste/
267b4(mdo sde): de ni lus dang ngag yid las rnams gang byed pa// thams cad shes pas byas te skye bo phan par byed// gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa// de ni smra tshe bsngag
267b5(mdo sde): bzad par mi 'gyur te// sems can thams cad 'dren pa shes rab cher gyur kyang // de yi bsngags pa bskal pa mang por bsam mi khyab//
267b6(mdo sde): bam po bdun pa ste tha ma'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la legs so zhes bya ba
267b7(mdo sde): gnang ste/ gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po khyod kyis gzungs rnam par nges pa bstan pa 'di legs par bshad pa dang / ji ltar yang khyod chos 'di dag la gzhan gyi dring la mi
268a1(mdo sde): 'jog pa dang / ji ltar yang khyod skyon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gzungs kyi sgo'i tshig zab mo rnams yongs su 'dri ba'i rang bzhin can du gyur ba legs
268a2(mdo sde): so legs so// de'i phyir gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya'o// gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/
268a3(mdo sde): bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa rgyas pa/ tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab par gyur pa dri'i tshe de'i dus na/ rnam par snang byed kyi bsgral pa la/ 'jig rten gyi
268a4(mdo sde): khams dri ma med par de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar du gyur pa 'jig rten du byung ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa
268a5(mdo sde): de'ang bai DUR+Ya dag par gyur te/ me long lta bur shin tu byi dor byas pa lag mthil lhur mnyam pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams der rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa rin po che'i yal ga dang /
268a6(mdo sde): lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bur ldan pa drag byung bar gyur to// 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi pad+ma tshad shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam du gyur pa/ sna tshogs pa blta na sdug pa dag kyang
268a7(mdo sde): byung bar gyur to// lha dang mi de dag kyang rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa la yongs su longs spyod par gyur to// zas dang skom yang bsams pa tsam gyis 'byor te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/
268b1(mdo sde): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang yongs su spyod pa lha dang mi dag gi longs spyod dang yongs su spyod pa'ang de 'dra bar gyur to// lha dang mi de dag kyang 'dod chags chung
268b2(mdo sde): ba zhe sdang chung ba/ gti mug chung ba/ rnam par bzang ba shin tu rnam par rig par byed par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams de na nyi ma dang zla bar btags pa rnams med par gyur te/
268b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba de'i lus kyi 'od kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gsal bar gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams de na pad+ma la
268b4(mdo sde): zums pas mtshan mo zhes bya ba dang / pad+ma kha bye bas nyin mor bgrangs pa ma togs par nyin mtshan du gdags pa med do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba
268b5(mdo sde): de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba snyoms par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya phrag drug cur gyur to// khyim pa tshad med pa dag ni
268b6(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs par gyur to// de na theg pa chen po ma gtogs par theg pa rnam par dgod pa gzhan med par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de ni phyir/
268b7(mdo sde): mi ldog pa dag pa'i gtam yang dag par ston to// bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa phyed du gyur to// mi rnams kyang bar ma dor 'chi ba'i dus byed pa med par gyur to// sangs rgyas
269a1(mdo sde): kyi zhing de na gang dag sa la gnas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rnams na gnas pa de dag ni mi zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o// gang dag nam mkha' la gnas pa'i khang pa
269a2(mdo sde): brtsegs pa rnams na gnas pa de dag ni lha zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba ma gtogs par/ lha dang mi rnams kyi kha dog dang / yongs su spyod pa tha dad du bya ba med par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams
269a3(mdo sde): de na bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rgyal po bla na med pa de ma gtogs par rgyal po gzhan gang yang med do// lha dang mi de dag thams cad kyang de bzhi ni gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las byed pa dang / chos
269a4(mdo sde): nyan pa la 'dun par gyur pa ma gtogs par lha gzhan med/ ston pa gzhan med/ gzhan la phyag mi 'tshal las gzhan mi byed/ gzhan yid la mi byed par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams
269a5(mdo sde): de na bud med du gdags pa med do// sems can de dag bslab pa gsum po dag la slob pa ma gtogs par lhung bar gdags pa med do// bslab pa las 'da' bar gdags pa med do//
269a6(mdo sde): bslab pa gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa dang / lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa dang / lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa'o// de la lhag pa'i tshul
269a7(mdo sde): khrims kyi bslab pa gang zhe na/ gang thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems mi gtong ba dang / mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad rnam par spong ba'o// de la lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa gang zhe na/
269b1(mdo sde): gang ting nge 'dzin la rab tu gnas nas lhag pa'i shes rab thob pa'o// de la lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa gang zhen/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu gnas nas so so yang nga/
269b2(mdo sde): par rig pa thob pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni lung phog pa med par bsgrub pa 'di lta bu dag la slob pa dag go// 'jig rten gyi khams de ni de lta bur yongs su dag par gyur to//
269b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de'i chos bstan pa'ang de lta bur yongs su dag par gyur to// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'od dpal zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa de stan las
269b4(mdo sde): langs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzungs gzungs zhes bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das
269b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' dag gzungs gang la rab tu gnas nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis gsungs pa kun tu 'dzin pa dang / chos bstan pa na zad par mi 'gyur ba dang /
269b6(mdo sde): legs par bshad pas sems can thams cad tshim par bgyid pa'i gzungs de gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba des/
269b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' 'od dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di yongs su 'dri bar sems pa legs so legs so//
270a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu rin chen smon pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' dag gzungs de la rab tu gnas nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs/
270a2(mdo sde): pa kun tu 'dzin to// legs par bshad pas sems can thams cad tshim par byed do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba la/ byang chub
270a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'od dpal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang thos pas bdag cag de bzhin du sgrub cing gzungs 'di 'thob par 'gyur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pas rin
270a4(mdo sde): chen sgron ma'i gzungs la gang cung zad 'jug pa tsam zhig legs par bshad du gsol de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang bas byang chub sems dpa' 'od dpal tshe gA subacad de/
270a5(mdo sde): bka' stsa la pa/ nyon mongs rnams kyi rdul dang bral gyur te// dri ma med cing dri ma kun tu spangs// sems ni rtag tu dag cing dri med pa// 'di ni rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs yin no//
270a6(mdo sde): lus kyis ngag rnams dag cing yid kyis ni// zla ba lta bur dri bral dri med 'od// byams pa'i sems dang yid kyang snyoms gyur pa// 'di ni rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs yin no// gnyis
270a7(mdo sde): su lta ba dag las rnam grol zhing // rtog dang rnam par rtog dang kun tu bral// 'du shes rnams ni yongs su shes gyur pa// 'di ni rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs yin no// dran dang blo gros
270b1(mdo sde): rtogs la 'jug par 'grub// shes rab che ldan yon tan rnams dang ldan// nam mkha'i dkyil ltar dri ma med cing dag/ 'di ni rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs yin no// dkon mchog gsum/
270b2(mdo sde): po rgyun mi 'chung ba dang // dri gsum rnam spangs srid pa gsum las grol// gnyis la yid gnyis za ba mthar 'byin pa// rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs ni dag pa yin// 'dod chags dang /
270b3(mdo sde): ni zhi sdang gti mug bcom// dus ngan skyon spangs yon tan kun dang ldan// nyon mongs mun pa rab rib sel byed pa// rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs kyi mchog yin no// 'jig rten dag na sgra
270b4(mdo sde): skad tha ma dang // 'bring dang mchog ni ji snyed yod pa dag/ sgra rnams kun la shin tu zhugs gyur pa// rid chen sgron ma'i gzungs ni rdul dang bral// zab mo'i tshegs rnams dang ni ldan
270b5(mdo sde): gyur cig/ tshig dang yig 'bru sna tshogs mtha' yas mang // bdag dang sems can dag tu lhung ba med// gnyis med ldan pa 'di ni gzungs yin no// so so yang dag rig pa thob
270b6(mdo sde): gyur cing // rkang pa snying po bzhi la rab gnas te// bsam gtan bzhi dang yang dag rab ldan pa// 'di ni rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs yin no// dam pa'i don gyi chos kyi tshul gyur cing /
270b7(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi dang bsdu dang ldan// mngon par shes pa lnga la 'gro byed pa// 'di ni rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs yin no// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gnas// yang dag
271a1(mdo sde): stong ba rnams dang rtag tu 'thun// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi la snod byed pa// 'di ni'i mi chen skyon pa'i gzungs yin no// dbang po lnga blo dag dang ldan m+b+ha TI ga
271a2(mdo sde): stobs lnga dag la gnas pa mi g.yo'i shugs// byang chub yan lag rnams dang rab ldan pa// 'di ni rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs yin no// yan lag brgyad pa'i lam gyis 'gro byed cing //
271a3(mdo sde): zhi gnas mchog dang lhag mthong zung du 'brel// rig dang rnam par grol bas 'gro byed pa// 'di ni rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs yin no// sa rnams gnon pa dag ni rab ldan zhing //
271a4(mdo sde): mtshams sbyor grol ba'i lam dang rjes su 'thun// nyes pa rnams ni kun tu spangs gyur pa// 'di ni rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs yin no// 'jig rten thams cad na ni snang byed cing //
271a5(mdo sde): ny+Ni dang zla ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ltar// rnam par dag cing mig ni 'byed byed pa// 'di ni rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs yin no// 'dir ni lha mig dag ste rab rib med// shes rab mchog
271a6(mdo sde): gi mig kyang rnam par dag/ 'dir ni chos kyi mig kyang dag gyur te// rgyal ba dam pa'i spyan ni rnam par dag/ 'dir ni nyon mongs bdud kyang dag par gyur// phung po lnga yi nyes pa 'dir
271a7(mdo sde): yongs dag/ 'dir ni 'chi bdag bdud kyang dag gyur cig/ 'di ni sde dang bcas pa'i bdud kyang bcom// 'dir ni gzungs la rab tu gnas nas su// bye ba khrag khrig dag gi zhing du 'gro// /
271b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas khrag khrig dag kyang mthong 'gyur zhing // bla na med pa'i chos kyang nyam par byed/ rgya chemachos ni thos par gyur nas kyang // gzungs kyi dran pa'i stobs kyis 'dzin pa byed/
271b2(mdo sde): don dang chog 'bru dag kyang zung ldan par// sems can thams cad la ni smyon par byed// rgyu dang rkyen gyis rnam par phye bas nA// sems ni skad cig 'jig par shes gyur te// chos rnams rab
271b3(mdo sde): tu dbye ba shes zab pa// gzungs 'di la ni gnas par gyur pa yin// spobs pa thob cing gsum rig chags pa med// mig gsum rnam par dag pa'ang rab tu thob// rnam par thar pa gsum
271b4(mdo sde): gyi don kyang thob// 'dir ni gzungs rnams thob par 'gyur dang ldan// gang dag gzungs rnams mang po gzhal yas shing // tshad med pa dag nges par bstan pa yang // gzungs kyi dam pa
271b5(mdo sde): 'di ni thob gyur na// de dag thams cad rab tu thob par 'gyur// bsam gtan gang dag rnam thar gang dag dang // snyoms 'jug ting 'dzin gang dgu mtha' yas dang // mngon par shes
271b6(mdo sde): pas rnam par rol dang gzungs// mtha' yas de dag la ni rab tu 'jug/ ji ltar rgya mtsho dpag tu med pa la// mtha' yas sgo nas rlung mtsho mtshe'u 'jug pa// de ltar gzungs 'di
271b7(mdo sde): 'dzin par byed pa yang // mtha' yas chos rnams kyi ni sgo mor 'jug/ zad pa med pa'i sgra la 'jug pa yang // zad pa med pa'i shes pas khong du chud// gzungs 'di smra bar byed
272a1(mdo sde): pa de yi ni// bsod nams thams cad zad par mi 'gyur ro// gzungs 'di rab tu thob par gyur pa ni// rin chen dam pa dri med lag tu 'gyur// gzugs dang
272a2(mdo sde): mtshan rnams dang ni rigs dang yang // rus dang skye ba dag ni rnam par dag/ zab mo'i tshul dag la ni 'jug pa dang // mi skye ba la bzod dang ma skyes dang // phyi rom ldog pa'i shes pa'i
272a3(mdo sde): sa dag kyang // gzungs 'di yin par nges par bstan pa yin// byang chub bla med mchog 'di tshol byed pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' mang po gang dag gis// gzungs 'di rab tu thob/
272a4(mdo sde): par gyur na ni// byang chub bla na med pa rnyed mi dka'// gang dag phyogs bcu rnams na bde bar gshegs// 'gro la phan drang bde phyir chos ston pa// gzungs kyi dam pa 'di ni thob gyur na//
272a5(mdo sde): de dag spobs pa rgyun chad mi 'gyur ro// gzungs 'di rab tu thob par gyur pa dag/ dga' dang mos dang bsam pa shes nas ni// de dag 'bras bu yod pa ston pas na// sems can khrag
272a6(mdo sde): khrig dag ni tshim par byed// gzungs 'di la ni gnas pa'i dpa' bo dag/ 'khor lo dam pa rab tu skor byed cing // sems can sdug bsngal sna tshogs rnams las 'grol/
272a7(mdo sde): theg pa dam pa la yang 'jog par byed// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang por ni// bsngags dang yom tan legs par brjod byas kyang // drang srong chen pos de yi yon tan gyi// mtha'/
272b1(mdo sde): ma brjod du nus par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba des gzungs bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'jo/
272b2(mdo sde): chen po de las byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis gzungs thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od dpal gyis ni rin chen sgron ma'i
272b3(mdo sde): gzungs 'di thob par gyur to// gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po khyod de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' 'od dpal zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du dogs shing
272b4(mdo sde): yid gnyis su gyur tam/ the tshom za bar blta na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyod nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' 'od dpal zhes bya bar gyur to//
272b5(mdo sde): gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po khyod kyis de tshun chad bgrang ba las 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dag la gzungs rnam par nges pa 'di yongs su dris so// yongs su dri ba byas
272b6(mdo sde): des na khyod da ltar yang de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su 'dri ba la de ltar 'jigs pa med cing / gzungs kyi rnam par nges pa 'di'ang ston to// khyod kun tu lta ba'i blos chos 'di
272b7(mdo sde): mngon sum du gyur pas/ rnam grangs 'dis na nges khyod byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dran pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to//
273a1(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs zhes bya ba 'khor 'di nyid du 'dug par gyur pa des/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
273a2(mdo sde): 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpas rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs 'di rab tu 'thob cing / thob nas kyang cha ba 'tshal bar mi bgyid pa dang / 'di lta ste/ gzungs kyi stobs bskyed pas sems
273a3(mdo sde): can thams cad nye bar 'tshe ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi
273a4(mdo sde): bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi rtsa ba la gnas par gyur pa dang / shes rab kyi las byed par gyur pa de'i tshe gzungs 'di rab tu thob bo// chud za bar mi byed do// sems can
273a5(mdo sde): thams cad kyi nye bar 'tshe bar yang 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
273a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das shes rab kyi rtsa ba ni gang lags/ shes rab kyi las ni gang lags/ de bzhin gshegs pas legs par bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa de'i phyir
273a7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu khyod shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ma thos pa'i chos nyan pa gang yin pa 'di ni shes rab kyi
273b1(mdo sde): rdzu ba'o// ji ltar thos pa'i chos gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa gang yin pa 'di ni shes rab kyi las so// dpyod pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// gang dpyad pa gzhan dag la nye ba spyon pa/
273b2(mdo sde): 'di ni shes rab kyi las so// tshul bzhin so sor rtog pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// sems can rnams tshul bzhin yid la rab tu 'god pa 'di ni shes rab kyi las so// yang dag par sbyor
273b3(mdo sde): ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// yang dag par sgrub pa ni shes rab kyi las so// sems la nges par sems pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// sems la nges par sems pa yang dag par ston pa ni shes rab
273b4(mdo sde): kyi las so// rab tu dben par gnas pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// lus dang sems dben par shes pa ni shes rab kyi las so// gcig pur dga' ba ni shes rab kyi rtsa bya'o// gcig pur
273b5(mdo sde): dgod pa'i lam sgrub pa ni shes rab kyi las so// zhi gnas dang lhag mthong sgom pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// rig pa dang rnam par grol ba 'thob pa ni shes rab kyi las so// rnam par thar pa gsu
273b6(mdo sde): sgom pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// rig pa gsum mngon sum du byed pa ni shes kyi las so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med pa ni shes rab
273b7(mdo sde): kyi las so// yang dag par spong ba sgom pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis spangs par rab tu shes pa ni shes rab kyi las so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa sgom pa ni shes
274a1(mdo sde): rab kyi rtsa ba'o// mngon par 'du bya ba med par rdzu 'phrul thob pa ni shes rab kyi las so// dang bas mos te yid ches pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o//
274a2(mdo sde): chags pa thams cad las yang drag par 'da' ba ni shes rab kyi las so// sems mi 'dzum pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pa ni shes rab kyi
274a3(mdo sde): las so// dran pa dang shes bzhin ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// dran pas bya ba rjes su dran pa ni shes rab kyi las so// ting nge 'dzin rim gyis rjes su rtogs par byed pa ni shes
274a4(mdo sde): rab kyi rtsa ba'o// rtag tu mnyam par gnas pa 'thob pa ni shes rab kyi las so// shes rab kyi dbang po la rten pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// dbang po mchog dang mchog
274a5(mdo sde): ni shes rab kyi lus so// stobs lnga'i gnas shes pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// bdud dang nyon mongs pas mi rdzi ba ni shes rab kyi las so// byang chub kyi yan lag dang
274a6(mdo sde): rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rjes su rtogs pa ni shes rab kyi las so// lam gyi yan lag yang dag par sgrub pa ni shes rab
274a7(mdo sde): kyi rtsa ba'o// chos thams cad gzings lta bur shes nas chos dang chos ma yin pa la mi gnas pa mi shes rab kyi las so// sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa
274b1(mdo sde): lam sgom pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// 'gog pa mngon sum du byed pa ni shes rab kyi las so// drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde kun chub par byed pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// nges pa'i don
274b2(mdo sde): gyi mdo la rton pa ni shes rab kyi las so// thos pa thams cad 'dzin pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// don la rton pa ni shes rab kyi las so// rnam par shes pa la so sor rtog pa ni shes rab
274b3(mdo sde): kyi rtsa ba'o// ye shes la rton pa ni shes rab kyi las so// gang zag gi sgra la mngon par zhen pa med pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// chos nyid la rton pa ni shes rab kyi las so// 'du byed thams cad mi
274b4(mdo sde): rtag par so sor rtog pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// gdod ma nas ma skyes par rab tu shes pa ni shes rab kyi las so// 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal bas so sor rtog pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// chom
274b5(mdo sde): thams cad mngon par 'du bya ba med par shes pa ni shes rab kyi las so// chos thams cad la bdag med par so sor rtog pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// sems can bzod ma nas rnam par dag pa badzin
274b6(mdo sde): rab kyi las so// mya ngan las 'das pa la zhi bar so sor rtog pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par shes pa ni shes rab kyi las so//
274b7(mdo sde): don thos nas skrag pa med pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// de na so so yang dag par rig pa ni shes rab kyi las so// yang dag pa'i chos nyid thos nas skrag pa med pa ni
275a1(mdo sde): shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// chos so so yang dag par rig pa ni shes rab kyi las so// nges pa'i tshig thams cad la skrag pa med pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// nges
275a2(mdo sde): pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa ni shes rab kyi las so// sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa thos nas skrag pa med pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ni shes
275a3(mdo sde): rab kyi las so// sems can la dmigs pa dang / chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// dmigs pa med pa'i byams pa ni shes rab kyi las so// bdag la med
275a4(mdo sde): pa dang / gzhan la byed pa la snying rje ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// mtha' gnyis ka gsal ba'i snying rje chen po ni shes rab kyi lus so// chos la snyems pa la mchog tu dga' bar byed pa'i
275a5(mdo sde): dga' ba ni shes kyi rtsa ba'o// blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa ni shes rab kyi las so// rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba dang bral ba'i btang snyoms ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o//
275a6(mdo sde): gnyis dang bral ba ni shes rab kyi las so// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// chos kyi sku rab tu shes pa ni shes rab kyi las so// chos rjes su dran pa ni shes rab kyi
275a7(mdo sde): rtsa b+ha'o// 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid shes rab kyi las so// dge 'dun rjes su dran pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// 'dus ma byas su mo sor rtogs pa ni shes rab kyi las so//
275b1(mdo sde): gtong ba rjes su dran pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba ni shes rab kyi las so// tshul khrims rjes su dran pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// tshul
275b2(mdo sde): khrims mngon par 'du bya ba med par shes pa ni shes rab kyi las mo// lha rjes su dran pa ni shes kyi rtsa ba'o// rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid ni shes rab kyi las so// thos pa la rtog pa ni shes rab kyi
275b3(mdo sde): rtsa ba'o// 'jig rten thams cad la rtog pa ni shes rab kyi las so// ma byas pa'i las byed pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// las kyi rnam par smin pa med par shes pa ni shes kyi las so//
275b4(mdo sde): nga rgyal med pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// ye shes chen po thob pa ni shes rab kyi las so// bdag gi don ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// gnyis ka'i don ni shes rab kyi las so// chos
275b5(mdo sde): kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong kun tu 'dzin pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong yongs su shes pa ni shes rab kyi las so// chos bstan pa shes pa ni shes rab kyi
275b6(mdo sde): rtsa ba'o// 'bras bu yod pa'i chos ston pa ni shes rab kyi las so// sems can rnams byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
275b7(mdo sde): dang / thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rab tu 'god pa 'di ni shes rab kyi las so// srid par 'gro bar skye ba thams cad kyis skrag pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o//
276a1(mdo sde): bsams bzhin du skye ba ni shes rab kyi las so// sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba'i bzod pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bzod pa ni shes rab kyi las
276a2(mdo sde): so// zad pa shes pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// mi skye ba'i shes pa ni shes rab kyi las so// rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ni shes rab kyi las so// /
276a3(mdo sde): phyir mi ldog pa'i sa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// dbang bskur ba'i sa ni shes rab kyi las so// byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// gang ci shes par bya ba dang / thob par bya ba dang //
276a4(mdo sde): rtogs par bya ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba de thams cad sems kyis skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
276a5(mdo sde): par 'tshang rgya ba 'di ni shes rab kyi las so// shes rab kyi rtsa ba dang las bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med dpag tu med pa dag rnam pa drug tu g.yos
276a6(mdo sde): par gyur to// 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod pa yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//
276a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das gang gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis pa 'di dag rab tu g.yos par gyur pa dang / nam mkha' la gnas pa'i 'khor gyi khyams
276b1(mdo sde): 'di'ang rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi rtsa ba dang las bstan pa'i chos
276b2(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs 'di 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sngon bshad pa na/ rigs kyi bu khyod nyid kyis nam mkha' yongs su 'dzin pa 'di nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la yongs
276b3(mdo sde): su dris shing yongs su dri ba byas te/ sa chen po g.yo ba 'jig rten du byung ba'i rgyu ni 'di yin no// rkyen ni 'di yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' so so yang dag par
276b4(mdo sde): rig pa la spobs pa zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs pa la shes rab brtsegs zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das
276b5(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ dri ma med pa'i bskal pa la 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba bzang po na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpal sbas zhes bya ba sangs
276b6(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar du gyur pa 'jig rten du byung ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba bzang po de'i sems can rnams ni bde bar tshim pas gnas par gyur to// de bzhin
276b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa dpal sbas de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su gyur to// de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni nyan thos stong phrag brgyad cu
277a1(mdo sde): rtsa bzhir gyur to// rigs kyi bu de ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal sbas des byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi spobs pa rgya chen po nye bar gzung
277a2(mdo sde): ste/ dri ba bye ba phrag brgya ched du mdzad nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam pa khyed kyi nang nas su dus ji srid cig na dri ba bye ba phrag brgya po 'di dri ba ra
277a3(mdo sde): la bstan pa bye ba phrag brgya brgyas lan 'debs par smr-i/ de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gis gsol pa/ mtshan mo 'di bas te lan gdab par bgyi'o// kha cig gis gsol pa
277a4(mdo sde): dgung bdun na'o// kha cig gis gsol pa/ dgung zla phyed na'o// kha cig gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dris pa 'di dag bdag cag gis dgung zla gcig na lan gdab par bgyi'o//
277a5(mdo sde): de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' dran pa'i blo zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus te/ 'dug par gyur pa des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal sgras de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
277a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das bdag spyan las mi ldang zhing spyod lam 'khrug pa ma mchis par de bzhin gshegs pa dbang du brtsi rtse/ dri ba 'dribs par lan gdab par bgyi'o// skyes blangs pa des seng ge'i ska bslas
277a7(mdo sde): mthag tu de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// sdang ba chem po'ang 'jig rten du byung bar gyur to// snang ba nges bskul nas sa bla'i lha nas
277b1(mdo sde): bzung ste/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams 'dus so// dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma stong phrag mang po'ang 'dir 'dus par gyur to// de ltar/
277b2(mdo sde): skad cig thang cig lung tsam de la dpag tshad stong phrag bcur 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gcig tu gnas par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' dran pa'i blos 'khor 'dus pa chen po de mthong
277b3(mdo sde): nas/ rang gi bsod nams kyi stobs dang / ye shes kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / gzugs kyi stobs dang / spobs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa'i stobs dang
277b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / stobs kyi dri ba ched du mdzad pa bye ba phrag brgya po de kun tu bzung nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de'i mdun du dri ba bye ba
277b5(mdo sde): phrag brgya po re re la bstan pa'i bye ba phrag brgyas lan btab ste/ phyad pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa dang / rjes su ldan pa dang / rjes su 'brel ba dang / tshig dang yig 'brur ldan pa dang /
277b6(mdo sde): shin tu nges pa'i tshig rnams kyis de'i lan btab pa dang / 'khor de las srogs chags stong phrag drug cus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// byang chub
277b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' stong phrag bzhi bcu ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal sbas des de la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ legs so/
278a1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i sgra des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar byas so// sa bla'i lha rnams nas bzung ste/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris
278a2(mdo sde): kyi bar gyi lha rnams kyis kye ma gang shes rab dang / spobs pa dang / bstan pa 'di 'dra ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs su 'gyur ro zhes sgra phyung ste sgra bsgrags so//
278a3(mdo sde): de ltar na de shes rab brtsegs zhes ming du btags so// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' dran pa'i blo zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan yin pa snyam du dogs shing yid gnyis
278a4(mdo sde): su gyur tam/ the tshom za ba lta na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' dran pa'i blo zhes
278a5(mdo sde): bya bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di rgya cher brjod pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// ma mos gyur nas ma thos chos rnams rtag nyan pa// shes rab rtsa ba
278a6(mdo sde): sems can dag pas thos nas ni// 'dzin cing byams pas 'gro ba dag la ston byed pa// shes rab las te byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu byed// dpyod pa'i dran pa chen po 'di ni shes rab rtsa// /
278a7(mdo sde): dpyad nas 'gro la rtag tu ston pa shes rab las// gal te tshul bzhin rab sreg 'di ni shes rab rtsa// de la sbyar nas ston pa shes rab las shes bya// yang dag sbyor la gal te sbyor ba
278b1(mdo sde): shes rab rtsa// grub cing ston par byed pa de ni shes rab las// sems la nges par sems rnyed 'di ni shes rab rtsa// nges par sems par spyod pa 'di ni shes rab las// gcig pu
278b2(mdo sde): dben par spyod pa 'di ni shes rab rtsa// lus dang sems la nga'i ba med pa 'di ni shes rab las// gang tshe 'jis 'jigs gyur de ni shes rab rtsa// gcig pu bgrod pa'i lam la reg byed/
278b3(mdo sde): shes rab las// zhi gnas lhag mthong dga' ba 'di ni shes rab rtsa// rig dang rnam par grol la reg 'di shes rab las// rnam thar gsum la mngon par brtson pa shes rab rtsa/
278b4(mdo sde): rigs gsum mngon du byed pa shes rab las shes bya// gal te dran pa nyer gzhag sgom pa shes rab rtsa// dran med yid la byed med de ni shes rab las// sdig pa spangs te dge ba spyod//
278b5(mdo sde): pa shes rab rtsa// chos 'di rang bzhin spangs pa de ni shes rab las// gal te rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi sgom shes rab rtsa// lhun grub rdzu 'phrul thob pa 'dri ni shes rab las// dad pas mos nus yid/
278b6(mdo sde): ches pa ni shes rab rtsa// chags pa thams cad gang bral de ni shes rab las// zhum med rtag tu brtson pa de ni shes rab rtsa// lus dang yid sems rab sbyangs 'di ni shes rab las// dran dang shes bzhin mkhas/
278b7(mdo sde): pa 'di ni shes rab rtsa// gnas rnams kun la mi gnas 'di ni shes rab las// rang gi ting 'dzin rtogs pa de ni shes rab rtsa// rang bzhin mnyam par bzhag la spyod 'di shes rab las// gal te shes/
279a1(mdo sde): rab dbang por rab gnas shes rab rtsa// 'gro ba'i dbang po thams cad shes pas shes rab las// stobs lnga po dag rjes su sgom pa shes rab rtsa// bcom nas ye
279a2(mdo sde): shes thob pa de ni shes rab las// byang chub yan lag rjes pa 'thun bzod pa shes rab rtswa// chos kun rjes su gang rtogs de ni shes rab las// lam gyi yan lag skye gnas grub pa shes rab
279a3(mdo sde): rmya te chos dang chos min spong ba 'di ni shes rab las// sdug bsngal rang bzhin mkhas pa 'di ni shes rab rtsa// gal te 'gog pa mngon sum byed 'di shes rab las// drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde
279a4(mdo sde): tshig 'dzin shes rab rtsa// nges pa'i don la rton pa 'di ni shes rab las// thams cad thos pas mi ngoms 'di ni shes rab rtsa// don la rab tu rton pa 'di ni shes rab las// rnam par shes pa
279a5(mdo sde): tshul bzhin tshol la shes rab rtsa// ye shes la ni shes rab rton 'di shes rab las// gang zag gang la'ang ma zhen 'di ni shes rab rtsa// gal te chos nyid rton pa 'di ni shes rab las/
279a6(mdo sde): 'du byed mi rtag yongs su tshol ba shes rab rtswa// gal te bzod nas ma skyes shes pa shes rab las// 'du byed sdug bsngal mos par byed pa shes rab bya// chos rnams 'dus ma byas su mos
279a7(mdo sde): pa shes rab las// chos rnams bdag med the tshom med pa shes rab rtsa// sems can 'di dag gdong nas dag de shes rab las// mya ngan 'das la zhi bar mos pa shes rab rtsa// 'gro ba shin tu
279b1(mdo sde): b+ha ngan das 'dri shes rab las// don gyi rjes su rtogs pa 'di ni shes rab sa// don rtags so yang dag rig pa shes rab las// gal te chos nyid mos par byed pa shes rab rtsa// chos la sam
279b2(mdo sde): yang dag rig pa shes rab las// sgra rnams kun la skrag pa med 'di shes rab tu// nges tshig so so yang dag rig 'di shes rab las// skrag med blo yi spobs pa de ni shes rab rtsa// spobs pa so
279b3(mdo sde): so yang dag rig pa shes rab las// gal te sems can gnas pa'i byams de shes rab rtswa// dmigs pa med pa'i byams thob de ni shes rab las// bdag dang gzhan la snying rje 'di ni shes rab rtsa//
279b4(mdo sde): gang gis gnyis kar mi rtogs de ni shes rab las// mchog tu dga' la dga' ba thob 'di she ba rtsa// dga' med gdung ba med pa 'di ni shes rab las// byams dang gnod par mi byed de ni shes rab rtsa/
279b5(mdo sde): gnyis las sems grol thob pa 'di ni shes rab las// blo gros ldan pa sangs rgyas dran 'di shes rab rtsa// gang mo chos su rjes su rtogs pa shes rab las// chos kyang rtag tu drangad ba 'dri ni shes rab rtsa//
279b6(mdo sde): chos rnams 'dod chags bral bar rtogs pa shes rab las// yon tan las ni dge 'dun drin te shes rab rtsa// de yang 'dus ma byas su rtogs pa shes rab las// blo ldan gtong ba dran pa de ni shes rab tu//
279b7(mdo sde): gang phyir nyon mongs kun 'dor 'di ni shes rab las// tshul khrims shin tu dag pa dran 'di shes rab rtsa// tshul khrims zad pa med la gnas ni shes rab las// che ba'i bdag nyid lha dran 'di ni shes rab
280a1(mdo sde): mya// ngag nas dag pa dra ba 'di ni shes yu las// gang phyir bsgrims te thos pa tshol ba shes rab rtsa// gzhan dag las ni phyis mi tshol ba shes rab las// legs par byed/
280a2(mdo sde): ba'i las byed 'di ni shes rab rtswa// las phyis mngon par 'du mi byed pa shes rab las// nga rgyal med cing 'dud par byed pa shes rab rtsa// ye shes che ba'i bdag nyid thob 'di shes rab las/
280a3(mdo sde): bdag gi don la brtson 'gyur 'di ni shes rab rtsa// sems can rnams kyi don byed 'di mi shes rab las// gal te chos kyi phung po 'dzin byed shes rab rtsa// sems can spyod pa rjes su rtogs
280a4(mdo sde): byed shes rab las// gzhan gyi blo la yang dag thob byed shes rab rtsa// sems can theg gsum nges 'byung byed pa shes rab las// blo gros ldan pa sbyin dang snyan par smra ba dang // don byed
280a5(mdo sde): sems can yongs sprin shes rab rtsa// gal te don 'thun pa yis sangs rgyas yon tan 'god// 'di ni skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi shes rab las// srid pa kun tu 'bar shes skrag pa shes rab
280a6(mdo sde): rtsa// mi skye bzod pa thob pa de ni shes rab las// phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'di shes rab rtsa ba ste// dbang bskur ba yis thob de ni shes rab las// gal te byang chub shing drung 'dug pa shes rab
280a7(mdo sde): rtsa/ kun mkhyen ye shes reg pa 'di ni shes rab las// byang chub sems 'di shes rab rtsa ba zhes kyang bya// sems ni gnas su gang byed de ni shes rab las// gang dag byang chub sems la rtag
280b1(mdo sde): gnas mi g.yo ba// de dag shes rab kyis ni rtag tu las bya byed// rtsa ba 'di 'dra byang chub spyod pa mchog gi sems// sangs rgyas stobs dang de bzhin so so yang dag rig/ de yi bsngags pa/
280b2(mdo sde): bskal pa bye ba mang brjod kyang // sangs rgyas yon tan tha mar thug par 'gyur ba med// gang dag 'das pa'i bde gshegs de bzhin da ltar byung // gang dag ma 'ongs pa dang phyogs bcu'i thub
280b3(mdo sde): dbang po// tshad med pa la bsnyen bkur tshad med byed 'dod gang // de ni ma myos byang chub sems la dga' ba yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug
280b4(mdo sde): gi rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kye ma ji tsam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di shin tu rnam par nges shing la
280b5(mdo sde): ge rnams kyis bstan pa mtha' yas pa/ don gyi 'jug pa mtha' yas pa/ mi brtson pa rnams kyis 'jug pa dka' ba/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rjes su rtogs pas zab pa/ gnyis
280b6(mdo sde): pa spyod pa rnams kyis 'tshal bar dka' ba/ skye mched drug la rten pa rnams kyis mthong bar dka' ba/ theg pa dman pa la mos pa rnams kyis yid ches par dka' ba/ nyan thos dang rang
280b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma lags pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod yul chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid pas che ba ma mchis pa/ nam mkha'i mtshan
281a1(mdo sde): nyid kyi slad du 'gyur ba ma mchis pa/ shin tu 'das pas kun gzhi ma mchis pa/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rab tu shes pa/ rgyu thams cad yongs su shes
281a2(mdo sde): ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba nges par 'byung ba rnams kyis 'byung ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis thabs so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa rnams kyis rnam par phye bar bgyi ba/
281a3(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa thob pa rnams kyis rnam par dgrol bar bgyi ba/ tshul gcig la gnas pa rnams kyis mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par bgyi ba/ sna tshogs ma mchis par spyod pa rnams la
281a4(mdo sde): khyad par ma mchis pa/ nam mkha' dang mnyam pa/ gnyen po ma mchis pas mnyam pa nyid pas mi mnyam pa ma mchis pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid pas mi mnyam pa mnya
281a5(mdo sde): pa/ 'gogs pas rab tu phye bas gnyis dang bral ba/ yi ge rnams kyis dpyad du ma mchis pa/ don gyis yang dag par gzhag pa/ sgras rnam par rig par bgyi ba/ don dam par
281a6(mdo sde): brjod du ma mchis pa/ kun rdzob du brjod du ma mchis pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi mthu dang ldan pa/ theg pa gsum la rnam par rtog pa/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po dag rab tu
281a7(mdo sde): ston pa/ khams gsum pa las shis tu 'das pa/ rig pa gsum po dag khong du chung bar bgyid pa/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin bskyed pa/ chos thams cad kyi gnasas sa
281b1(mdo sde): ye shes las byung ba/ sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsal ba'i mdzad pa ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
281b2(mdo sde): kyi bu mo gang dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byang chub bstan pa tshad ma mchis pa 'di la mos par bgyid pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu'ang
281b3(mdo sde): sems bskyed par bgyid pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzungs pa'i slad du mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di nyan par bgyid pa dang / mos par bgyid pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang /
281b4(mdo sde): klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgyas par yang dag par ston par bgyid pa de dag bcom ldan 'das bsod nams mang du skyed pa lags so// de bzhin
281b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams la'ang byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa 'tshal ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/
281b6(mdo sde): de dag bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyis gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu bkang
281b7(mdo sde): ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la sbyin pa byin pa bas/ gang gis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba dang / dkon mchog gsum rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir mdo sde 'di lta bu
282a1(mdo sde): 'di nyan tam/ mos sam/ 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ ston tam/ gzhan dag la'ang rgyas par yang dag par ston tam/
282a2(mdo sde): bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson par gnas na/ 'di ni de bas bsod nams mang du skyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to//
282a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas spyan gyis zhing gang nges mthong ba// rin chen bkang ste de bzhin gshegs byin yang // 'di lta bu yi chos 'di ma thos na// de ni bsod nams chung zhes nga smra'o// gang
282a4(mdo sde): gis dam pa'i don ldan phra zab pa// mdo sde bzang po 'di ni thos gyur nas// kun+da tu 'dzin cing bzung nus klog byed pa// 'di ni de bas bsod nams mchog tu 'phags// 'di
282a5(mdo sde): ltar rgyal ba'i chos kyi nyer gnas shing // chos kyis nges par 'byung gi zang zing min// de bas gang zhig bde gshegs chos 'dzin pa// de ni sangs rgyas kun la byas pa gzo//
282a6(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de la bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam pa dag khyed kyi nang nas nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir//
282a7(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyas par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub 'di yongs su bsrung bar su spro/ de nas
282b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cus mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub
282b2(mdo sde): bskal pa grangs ma mchis par bsgrubs pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / slad mi'i tshe slad ma'i dus de na'ang rgyus par bgyid par spro'o// bcom ldan 'das 'on gyis kyang ci nas de'i dus na skye bo mang po gnas
282b3(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can de dag gi rna bar grags par 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs tu gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
282b4(mdo sde): kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bden pa gsungs// bden pa'i chos la rab tu gnas// byin gyis brlabs kyis de dag la// mdo sde 'di ni byin
282b5(mdo sde): gyis brlabs// snying rje chen po'i go cha bgos// byams pa de dag rab tu gnas// kun la byams pa nyid kyi phyir// mdo sde 'di ni byin gyis brlabs// bsod nams tshogs ni phun sum tshogs/
282b6(mdo sde): ye shes tshogs kyis byung gyur pa// tshogs rnams kun dang ldan pa yis// mdo sde 'di ni byin gyis brlabs// bdud rnams thams cad nges 'jom la// smra ba thams cad rab 'dul zhing /
282b7(mdo sde): lta ba thams cad rgyum gcod pa// mdo sde 'di ni byin gyis brlabs// 'jig rten skyong dang brgya byin dang // de bzhin lha ma yin rnams dang // lha dang dri za klu dag dang // ngas ni byin gyis brlabs
283a1(mdo sde): par byas// sa dang de bzhin par snang la// lha rnams mang po gang 'khod pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin brlabs kyis// tshul 'di rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur/
283a2(mdo sde): 'khor 'di bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir// tshangs pa'i gnas pa rnams ldan zhing // bden pa bzhi pos brgyan gyur pa// mdo sde 'di ni byin gyis brlabs// nam mkha' gzugs can byed
283a3(mdo sde): kyang srid// gzugs ni gzugs med byed srid kyi// sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin rlabs ni// rnam par dkrugs par mi nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das largyal po
283a4(mdo sde): chen po bdag gis mgrin gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag rnams// mdo 'di kun tu bsrung slad du// rtsa lag dang ni bcas
283a5(mdo sde): rnams kyis// bsrung ba bzang po bgyi bar 'tshal// mkhas pa byang chub blo gros bgyis// gang dag 'dzin par bgyid pa dag/ de dag la ni phyogs bzhi nas// rtag par kun tu bsrung
283a6(mdo sde): bar bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to// bdag ni bcom ldan mdzad pa gtso// 'dren pa chos kyi
283a7(mdo sde): dbang bdag lags// mgon po mdo sde mchog 'di las// sangs rgyas 'byung ba rab tu bstan// sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad kyi// mdzad pa gzo ba bsrung bgyid cing /
283b1(mdo sde): 'dri 'dra'i mdo dang de bzhin du// mdo sde 'dzin pa bsrung bar 'tshal// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to//
283b2(mdo sde): bsam gtan gang dang tshad med dang // theg pa kun gyis 'byung ba gang // de dag don ldan zab mo yi// mdo sde 'di las nges par 'byung // bdag ni tshangs pa'i bde bor te// gang
283b3(mdo sde): na tshul 'di 'chad par ni// mnyan pa'i slad dang de bzhin du// bsrung ba'i slad du mchi bar bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i bu rab dga' ldan gyis tshigs su bcad pa
283b4(mdo sde): 'di gnyis gsol to// gang gis sangs rgyas gsungs pa yi// mdo sde 'di ni 'dzin 'gyur ba// skye ba gcig gis rab gnas nas// dga' ldan rnams su gnas par 'gyur//
283b5(mdo sde): mgon po bdag ni lha yul ba'i// phun sum tshogs pa bor nas su// tshul 'di rab tu ston bgyid cing // 'dzam bu gling du gnas par spro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ bdud kyi bu
283b6(mdo sde): ded dpon gyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to// gang zhig don dang ldan pa yi// mdo sde 'di ni 'dzin 'gyur ba// de dag bdud las 'di spangs pas// bdud kyi dbang du mi mchi'o//
283b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa bdag kyang ni// mdo 'di kun tu bsrung slad du// ci nas kyang ni rgyas 'gyur bar// brtson par bgyid cing 'dun par bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ bdud sdig can gyis
284a1(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to// rnam par 'dren pa gang zhig ni// nyon mongs thams cad tshar gcod pa// 'di 'dzin bgyid pa de dag la// bdag
284a2(mdo sde): ni sgrim par mi bgyid do// mdo sde mchog ni 'byung ba der// bdud kyi go skabs ma mchis so// mgon pos gsungs pa dran bgyid pa// de la bsrung ba bgyi bar 'tshal// de nas bcom
284a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das la/ lha'i bu mtshams rab kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'dri gnyis gsol to// sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub ni// mdo sde 'di las rab bshad pas// gang zhig mdo sde 'di
284a4(mdo sde): 'dzin pa// des ni sangs rgyas kun la mchod// mgon po bdag ni mdo sde 'di// lha ni bye ba rnams la bshad// gang dag gus par nyan pa dag/ byang chub yang dag 'dzin du stsal//
284a5(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to// mi gang byang chub rab zhugs te// dam chos yongs su bsrung slad du// bdag
284a6(mdo sde): kyang gtong bgyid de dag ni// gsol ba ma btab bshos gnyen lags// bdag ni dga' ldan mchis nas su// sangs rgyas kyi no byin rlabs kyis// 'di lta bu yi mdo sde 'di//
284a7(mdo sde): shin tu rgyas par bgyi bar 'tshal// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to// ston pa las ni bdag gis su
284b1(mdo sde): mdo sde stong phrag mang thos kyang // bdag gis mdo sde 'di lta bu// sngon chad nam yang mthos so// mngon sum du ni mdo sde 'di// blangs shing kun tu gzungs lags te// byang chub
284b2(mdo sde): sems dpa'i ched du ni// shin tu rgyas par bgyi bar 'tshal// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang / lha'i bu de dag dang
284b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ skyes bu dam pa dag khyed kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ 'di lta bu'i
284b4(mdo sde): seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa legs so legs so// skyes bu dam pa dag khyed la bsgo'o// khyod kyis khong du chud par bya'o// sems can gang dag theg pa chen po la zhugs pa/ bzod
284b5(mdo sde): par thob pa de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di kun tu gzung ste/ bzung nas kyang kun chub par byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
284b6(mdo sde): papa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa ma thob kyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa bdun pa las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro// gang dag nyan thos kyi theg pa par 'gyur ba de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i
284b7(mdo sde): nyan thos 'dus pa dang po'i grangs su chung bar 'gyur ro// rab sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin par 'gyur ba de dag na nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu
285a1(mdo sde): gzhan las ma thos par rang byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos yongs su zhus pa bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bcom ldan
285a2(mdo sde): 'das kyis bstan pa na/ sems can dpag tu med pa dag byang chub tu sems bskyed do// byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa dag ni phyir mi ldog pa la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten
285a3(mdo sde): gyi khams grangs med pa dag ni rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// snang ba chen pos kyang gsal bar gyur to// me tog sil mas kyang gtor bar 'gyur to// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
285a4(mdo sde): nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi khyams rin po
285a5(mdo sde): bkod pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog gis rnam par bkra bar byas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis rnyed par bgyi ba legs par rnyed do//
285a6(mdo sde): gang gi slad du bdag cag gis rnam par nges pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu thos pas bdag cag 'dir mchis pa don mchis pa lags so// kye ma bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i
285a7(mdo sde): sku tshe yongs su bskyang du gsol/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par 'gyur cig/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge
285b1(mdo sde): bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma gang dag mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa de dag kyang dus ring por yun ring du chos yongs su skyong bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad la'ang phan pa byed/
285b2(mdo sde): par gyur cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du rnam par
285b3(mdo sde): nges pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni don bzang ba dang / tshig 'bru bzang ba dang / legs par brgyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mchog tu dga' ba skyed pa dang
285b4(mdo sde): bdud dang pha rol rgol ba thams cad 'joms pa dang chos thams cad la mkhas pa 'dzin pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa tshim par bgyid pa dang / theg pa thams
285b5(mdo sde): cad kyi nges par 'byung ba'i phyir 'byung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan la 'jug pa'i rjes su song ba dang / thams cad kyis brtson par bgyi ba la gti mug ma
285b6(mdo sde): mchis par ston pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
285b7(mdo sde): kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de'i phyir gzungs kyi dbang phyugs kyi rgyal po khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin
286a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po bstan pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i las don yod pa nyan pa lung bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig
286a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang / nyan thos kyi tshogs de thams cad dang /
286a3(mdo sde): lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po
286a4(mdo sde): bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing nus te/ skad
286a5(mdo sde): gsar gcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// rgya ga skad du/ Ar+ya tsa tuN+Ta nir hA ra nA ma ma hA ya na sU tra/ bod skad du/
286a6(mdo sde): 'phags pa bzhi pa bsgrub pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom
286a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong thams
286b1(mdo sde): cad kyang go cha chen po bgos pa sha skrag dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
286b2(mdo sde): 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas na so chos ston to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir rin po che'i gdugs dpag tshad
286b3(mdo sde): bcu'i tshad tsam thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu 'dzin to// de nas 'khor de nyid du dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu dpal bzangs ldan zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
286b4(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa g.yog dang bcas te 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas/ 'dug pa de stan las langs te/ gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas
286b5(mdo sde): la btsugs te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ga lA ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod da dung
286b6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las mdzad pas mtshim mam 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ rgya mtsho chen po chu thams cad len pas gzhar yang chog
286b7(mdo sde): shes sam/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin du rgya mtsho chen po mtsho gting dpag dka' ba de lta bu'i thams cad mkhyen
287a1(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes tshad med/ dpag tu med pa btsal bar bya ste/ byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyis gzhar yang tshim par mi bya'o//
287a2(mdo sde): lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpas ci la dmigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bgyi/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpas dmigs
287a3(mdo sde): pa bzhis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs pa dang / sems can thams cad rab tu bkrol ba la dmigs
287a4(mdo sde): pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par bya ba la dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su bzung ba la dmigs pa ste/ lha'i bu byang chub sems
287a5(mdo sde): dpas dmigs pa bzhi po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis tshangs pa'i ris kyi lha'i bu'i nang du tshangs pa gtsug bud can la
287a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i lam bzhi pa bsgrub pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad pa de 'jam dpal legs par bshad du gsol/ de la ni bdag dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i
287a7(mdo sde): 'khor 'di'ang nyan par 'tshal lo// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos kyi ser sna ma mchis slob dpon gyi chos kyi dpe mkhyud kyang ma mchis 'jam dpal
287b1(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / bzhi pa bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de ngas khyod la bshad do// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag
287b2(mdo sde): ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sems bskyed par rig par bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ lha'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can dpag tu med pa bsdu ba'i phyir/
287b3(mdo sde): sems bskyed pa dang / sems can dpag tu med pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sems bskyed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med pa bsags pa'i phyir sems bskyed pa dang
287b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir sems bskyed pa ste/ lha'i bu bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsams pa'i sems
287b5(mdo sde): bskyed par rig par bya'o// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa brag lta bu yin no// bzhi gang zhe na/ slong ba rnams la khong khro ba med pa'i
287b6(mdo sde): sems dang log par zhugs pa rnams la snying rje ba'i sems dang / shes rab las ma nyams pa'i sems dang / rtsom pa nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa'i sems te/ lha
287b7(mdo sde): bu bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa brag lta bu yin no// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa mngon par 'phags
288a1(mdo sde): pa yin no// bzhi gang zhe na/ tshul khrims mngon par 'phags pa dang / thos pa mngon par 'phags pa dang / byams pa chen po mngon par 'phags pa/
288a2(mdo sde): dang / snying rje chen po mngon par 'phags pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa brtan pa snying po can mi phyed pa
288a3(mdo sde): rdo rje lta bu'o// bzhi gung zhe nu/ bsam pa las mi phyed pa dang / mdza' bra las mi phyed pa dang / nan tan las mi phyed pa dang / theg pa chen po las mi phyed pa ste bzhi po
288a4(mdo sde): de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa bsnyen dka' ba yin no// bzhi gang zhe na/ nyon mongs pa dang ma 'dres pa dang / rnyed pa dang /
288a5(mdo sde): bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa thams cad dang ma 'dres pa dang / theg pa dman pa dang ma 'dres pa dang / skye bo mi bgrangs pa thams cad dang ma 'dres pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go//
288a6(mdo sde): lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa bla na med pa'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'phangs pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i sems dang /
288a7(mdo sde): byin nas 'gyod pa med pa'i sems dang / rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa'i sems dang / byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba'i sems te/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di
288b1(mdo sde): dgra ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyi bor phyin pa'i chos so// bzhi gang zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su
288b2(mdo sde): 'dzin pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi lam ston par byed pa'o//
288b3(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson po dang bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams kyi rjes su 'thun pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas bsgrub pa dang mngon par shes pas rnam par
288b4(mdo sde): ba stebazhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos gya nom pa dam pa mchog yin no// bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa
288b5(mdo sde): dang / gang dag de dang dgal bar byed pa de dag nyid rab tu thar par bya bar sems bskyed pa dang / ji tsam gyi yul rgya chen po zhig 'byor kyang de la bag yod pa dang / ji tsam du dbu la
288b6(mdo sde): bas 'phongs par gyur kyang chos spyod pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ khyim par gyur ni bdag
288b7(mdo sde): gi longs spyod kyis chog shes pa dang / gzhan gyi nor la mngon par 'dod pa med pa dang / rab tu byung na 'phags pa'i rigs kyis chog shes pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang
289a1(mdo sde): yo byad baspungs pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ chos sbyin pa dang /
289a2(mdo sde): zang zing sbyin pa dang / shog shog dang / snag tsha dang / smyu gu dang / glegs bam sbyin pa dang / chos smra ba las nan tan snying po nyid dang / longs spyod pa zhes bya ba sbyin pa ste/
289a3(mdo sde): bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sem sa dpa' rnams kyi snying po nyid do// bzhi gang zhe na/ thos pa las nan tan snying po nyid dang / longs spyod pa rnams
289a4(mdo sde): las gtong ba'i snying po nyid dang / lus las bla ma la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i snying po nyid dang / srog las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i snying po nyid de/ bzhi po de dag go/
289a5(mdo sde): lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su gtang bar mi bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems yongs su btang bar mi bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su
289a6(mdo sde): gtang bar mi bya ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su gtang bar mi bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos thams cad yong su btsal ba yong su gtang bar mi bya ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lnga'i
289a7(mdo sde): bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skyed mos tshal lo// bzhi gang zhe na/ dgon pa la gnas pa dang / dben pa la mngon par dga' ba dang / dge ba'i
289b1(mdo sde): chos la bdun pa dang / thabs mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzhal med khang
289b2(mdo sde): ngo/ bzhi gang zhe na/ tshangs pa'i gnas dang / 'brel ba'i gtam gyis chos nyan pa la dga' ba myong bar byed pa dang / stong pa nyid la nges par sems pa dang / skye bo rigs 'thun
289b3(mdo sde): ba dang 'du ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nor mi zad pa'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ thos pa'i nor dang / chos ston pa'i drang
289b4(mdo sde): sems can dbul po sdud pa'i nor dang byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ba'i nor te/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gter ro// bzhi gang zhe na/
289b5(mdo sde): gzungs kyi gter dang / spobs pa'i gter dang / chos kyi gter dang / longs spyod zad mi shes par yongasasu bsngo ba'i gter te/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni
289b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' las rnams kyi mngon par 'byung ba'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du 'dzi las 'byung ba dang / yul thams cad las 'byung ba dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa'i
289b7(mdo sde): bsam pa las 'byung ba dang / khams gsum thams cad las 'byung ba ste/ bzhi po de dag ni mngon par 'byung ste/ bzhi po de dag ni mngon par 'byung ba'o// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di
290a1(mdo sde): dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bde ba'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ dngos po thams cad la mi blta ba'i phyir bdag gi ba med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i
290a2(mdo sde): bde ba dang / yul spangs pas dben pa'i bde ba dang / nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir zhi ba'i bde ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde/
290a3(mdo sde): ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mchog tu dga' ba'o// bzhi gang zhen/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas mchog tu dga' ba
290a4(mdo sde): chos thos pas mchog tu dga' ba dang / sbyin pa la 'gyod pa med pas mchog tu dga' ba dang / sems can thams cad la bde ba skyed pas mchog tu dga' ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go//
290a5(mdo sde): lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bden pa'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dang / yi dam las mi nyams pa dang / skyabs su song
290a6(mdo sde): bdag yongs su mi gtong ba dang / ngag bsdams pas tshig thams cad bden pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i chos so//
290a7(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/ dge ba'i chos thams cad la lhag pa'i bsam pas sbyor ba dang ma bslabs pa thams cad la mi brnyas pa dang gsol ba ma btab par sems can thams cad la
290b1(mdo sde): bshes gnyen du gyur pa dang / yon tan thams cad bsgrub pa la phyir bya ba'i re ba med pas lan la mi re ba ste/ bzhi po de dag gro// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi/
290b2(mdo sde): spyod pa rnam par dag pa'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag med pa'i phyir tshul khrims rnam par dag pa dang / sems can med pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa dang / srog med pa'i phyir
290b3(mdo sde): shes rab rnam par dag pa dang / gang zag med pa'i phyir rnam par grol ba rnam par dag pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rkang pa'o//
290b4(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/ chos kyi rkang pa dang / don gyi rkang pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsrungs pas 'jug pa'i rkang pa dang / byang chub kyi lam gyi tshogs sogs pa'i rkang pa ste/
290b5(mdo sde): bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lag pa'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ dad pa'i lag pa dang / tshul khrims kyi lag pa dang / thos pa'i lag pa dang /
290b6(mdo sde): shes rab kyi lag pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mig go// bzhi gang zhe na/ las legs par byas pa'i phyir sha'i mig dang
290b7(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa las mi nyams pa'i phyir lha'i mig dang / shin tu thos pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir shes rab kyi mig dang / chos thams cad las nges par sems pa'i chos kyi mig ste/
291a1(mdo sde): bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi ngoms pa'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pas mi ngoms pa dang / dgon pa la
291a2(mdo sde): gnas pas mi ngoms pa dang / chos nyan pas mi ngoms pa dang / dge ba'i chos kyi tshogs thams cad kyis mi ngoms pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang
291a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dka' ba byed pa'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can mthu chung ba rnams la bzod cing dang du blang ba dka' ba byed pa dang / dbul po la bdog pa thams cad
291a4(mdo sde): yongs su gtang bar bsam pa dka' ba byed pa dang / yan lag gi mchog mgo slong ba la khong khro ba med pa'i sems dka' ba byed kyi steng du dge ba'i bshes gnyen du sems bskyed
291a5(mdo sde): ba dang / skye bami rtogs pas bsams bzhin du skye bar byed pa'i dka' ba byed pa ste/ bzhi po dag go// lha'i bu ba'i po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nang meng pa'o//
291a6(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/ khams mnyam pas nad med pa dang // nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba med pas nad med pa dang / sems can thams cad bde bar mnyam par gzhog pas nad med pa
291a7(mdo sde): chos thams cad la the tshom med pas nad med pa ste/ ba'i po de dag go / lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag mi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdag gis phyogs so// bzhi gang zhen/ bu rol
291b1(mdo sde): phyin pa'i phyogs dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi phyogs dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen yang dag pa'i phyogs dang / sdig pa'i thams cad mi bya ba'i phyogs dang / badz+ra/
291b2(mdo sde): de dag go/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi bskyod pa'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems mi bskyod pa yi dam mi bskyod pa dang / ji skad smras
291b3(mdo sde): pa de bzhin du byed pa las mi bskyod pa dang / yang dag pa'i nan tan las mi bskyod pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi tshogs so//
291b4(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/ zhi gnas kyi tshogs dang / lhag mthong gi tshogs dang / thos pa'i tshogs dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi tshogs te/ bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni
291b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos zung du 'brel bar 'gyur ba'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ bsam pa dang sbyor ba zung du 'brel ba dang / gtong ba dang sngo ba zung du 'brel ba dang / byams
291b6(mdo sde): pa dang snying rje zung ngu 'brel ba dang / thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi sgrib pa'i rgyu mthun
291b7(mdo sde): pa'i rmi lam mo// bzhi gang zhe na/ khron pa rdul can mthong zhing de'i gting na'ang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang / mtshe'u dang / rdzing bu 'am/ khron pa rnyog pa can mthong zhing de'i
292a1(mdo sde): gting na yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang / bar snang la sprin chen pos log cing de la'ang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang / bar snang la rlung dang
292a2(mdo sde): rdul dang / du bas 'khrigs par mthong zhing de la'ang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las kyi sgrib pa rgyu 'thun
292a3(mdo sde): pa'i rmi lam mo// bzhi gang zhe na/ g.yang sa chen po nas bdag g.yang du lhung bar mthong ba dang / lam mtho dman can du mthong ba dang / bdag lam srang drog par zhugs par mthong ba dang
292a4(mdo sde): rmi lam na phyogs bslad cing 'jigs pa mang po mthong ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i rgyu 'thun pa'i rmi lam mo//
292a5(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/ drug drag pos 'khrugs par mthong ba dang / gcan gzan gtum po phal po che'i sgra thos pa dang bdag g.yon can gyi nang na gnas par mthong ba dang / bdag gi lus dri
292a6(mdo sde): mtshan dang gos dri ma chen du mthong ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs 'thob pa'i rgyu 'thun pa'i rmi lam mo//
292a7(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/ gter chem pa rin po cha sna tshags kyis gang ba mthong ba dang / rdzing bum tog bad+ma rgyas pas yongs su gang ba mthong ba dang / bdag gos dkar po'i 'khrugs red par mthong ba dang /
292b1(mdo sde): lha zhig spyi bo'i gtsug nas gdugs 'dzin par mthong ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i rgyu 'thun pa'i rmi lam mo//
292b2(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/ bu mo bzang mo rgyan bzang pos brgyan pa me tog sil ma 'bul bar mthong ba dang / nam mkha' la bya ngang pa dkar po thal dkar gyi khyu skad 'byin cing 'gro bar mthong ba dang
292b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mang pos brgyan pa'i phyag spyi bor 'jog par mthong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa me tog pad+ma la bzhugs shing bsam gtan mdzad par mthong ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go/
292b4(mdo sde): lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'i rgyu 'thun pa'i rmi lam mo// bzhi gang zhe na/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'char bar mthong ba dang / nyi ma'i
292b5(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor 'char bar mthong ba dang / me tog pad+ma kha 'brus par mthong ba dang / tshungs pa'i dbang po'i rab tu zhi ba'i spyod lam mthong ba ste/ lha'i bu bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems
292b6(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'i rgyu 'thun pa'i rmi lam mo// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid kyi rgyu 'thun pa'i rmi lam mo// bzhi
292b7(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ shing sA la chen po'i 'dab ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs kyis gang bar mthong ba dang / 'khar ba'i snod gser gyis gang bar mthong ba dang / nam mkha'i ngos
293a1(mdo sde): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyis gang bar mthong ba dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po mthong ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po
293a2(mdo sde): 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud 'dul ba'i rgyu 'thun pa'i rmi lam mo// bzhi gang zhe na/ gyang chen pos gyad thams cad mnan nas ba dan thogs te 'gro bar mthong ba dag
293a3(mdo sde): dpa' bo chen po g.yul las 'das te 'gro ba mthong ba dang / rgyal por dbang bsgyur bar mthong ba dang / bdag nyid byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug cing bdud 'dul bar mthong ste/ bzhi po dadag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di drag ni
293a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags kyi rgyu 'thun pa'i rmi lam mo// bzhi gang zhen/ mgro la thod dkar pos bcings par mthong ba dang / bdag gtan bya med
293a5(mdo sde): pa'i mchod sbyin byed par mthong ba dang // bdag chos kyi spyan chen po la 'dug par mthong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs shing chos ston par mthong ba ste/
293a6(mdo sde): bzhi po dang ga go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi snying po zab pa'i rgyu 'thun pa'i rmilam me// bzhi gang zhen/ bram pa mthong ba dang
293a7(mdo sde): gas pag ba yong ba dang / gang ga sa tsha'i dang nyi tsha thams cad dang rnam mi 'dub ga 'tshal bar byed pa dang gser kyi 'jogs bu'i la ma
293b1(mdo sde): lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi snying po mthong ba'i rgyu 'thun pa'i rmi lam mo// 'jam dpal gzhon nu pas bzhi pa bsgrubs pa'i chos kyi rnam
293b2(mdo sde): grangs 'di bshad pa na/ lha'i bu dpal bzangs ldan dga' mgu yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nasa'akhor dang bcas pas 'jam dpal
293b3(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir lha'i me tog man+da ra ba dag dang ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu dA dang / pad+ma dkar po dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la
